 10543                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
 10544                                  ;============================================================================
 10545                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10546                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 10547                                  
 10548                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0 
 10549                                  
 10550                                  ; 30/12/2022
 10551                                  ; (BIOSCODE SEGMENT is 2CCh for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)  -- ((25C0h+700h)>>4) --
 10552                                  
 10553                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
 10554                                   
 10555                                  ; 02/10/2022
 10556                                  
 10557                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
 10558                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10559                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 10560                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10561                                  
 10562                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
 10563 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
 10564 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
 10565                                  
 10566                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10567                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
 10568                                  ; 09/12/2022
 10569                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
 10570                                  
 10571                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10572                                  
 10573                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10574                                  ; 20/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 10575                                  
 10576                                  ;************************************************************************
 10577                                  ;*									*
 10578                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
 10579                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
 10580                                  ;*									*
 10581                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
 10582                                  ;*									*
 10583                                  ;************************************************************************
 10584                                  
 10585                                  	; 20/09/2023	
 10586                                  	; 10/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 10587                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0032h 
 10588                                  
 10589                                  _seg_reinit:
 10590 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 10591                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
 10592                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
 10593 00000037 BF[0406]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
 10594                                  		;mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
 10595                                  		; 10/08/2023
 10596 0000003A B90300                  		mov	cx, 3 ; (PCDOS 7.1)
 10597                                  _seg_reinit_1:
 10598 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
 10599 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
 10600 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
 10601 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
 10602                                  		; 10/08/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 10603                                  		; (direct jump to i2f_handler from BIOSDATA:bios_i2f)
 10604                                  		; (instead of 'bcode_i2f: dw i2f_handler, IOSYSCODESEG')
 10605 00000042 26A3[0800]              		mov     [es:bios_i2f_seg], ax ; actual BIOSCODE segment
 10606                                  
 10607 00000046 CB                      		retf
 10608                                  
 10609                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10610                                  
 10611                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10612                                  
 10613                                  ;************************************************************************
 10614                                  ;*									*
 10615                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
 10616                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
 10617                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
 10618                                  ;*									*
 10619                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
 10620                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
 10621                                  ;*									*
 10622                                  ;************************************************************************
 10623                                  
 10624                                  		; 20/09/2023
 10625                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
 10626 00000047 56                      		push	si
 10627 00000048 50                      		push	ax
 10628 00000049 51                      		push	cx
 10629 0000004A 52                      		push	dx
 10630 0000004B 57                      		push	di
 10631 0000004C 55                      		push	bp
 10632 0000004D 1E                      		push	ds
 10633 0000004E 06                      		push	es
 10634 0000004F 53                      		push	bx
 10635 00000050 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
 10636 00000052 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
 10637                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
 10638                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 10639 00000055 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 10640                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:005Ah)
 10641 0000005A C434                    		les	si, [si]
 10642                                  		;mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
 10643 0000005C 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
 10644 0000005E A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
 10645 00000061 8826[8004]              		mov	[printdev], ah
 10646                                  		;mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
 10647 00000065 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
 10648 00000069 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
 10649 0000006D 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
 10650 00000071 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
 10651 00000075 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
 10652                                  		; 17/10/2022
 10653 00000079 81FE[6F05]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
 10654                                  		;;cmp	si, 579h	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 10655                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
 10656                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
 10657 0000007D 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
 10658                                  
 10659                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
 10660                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
 10661                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
 10662                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
 10663                                  ;
 10664                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
 10665                                  ;
 10666                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
 10667                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
 10668                                  ;	  it has been used.
 10669                                  ;
 10670                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
 10671                                  
 10672                                  		; 20/09/2023
 10673                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
 10674 0000007F C706[9C04]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
 10675 00000085 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
 10676 00000088 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
 10677 0000008A 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
 10678                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
 10679                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
 10680 0000008E 8916[9C04]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
 10681 00000092 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
 10682                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
 10683                                  no_sector32_mapping:
 10684 00000096 97                      		xchg	ax, di
 10685 00000097 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
 10686 0000009B 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 10687 0000009E 732B                    		jnb	short command_error
 10688 000000A0 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
 10689 000000A1 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 10690 000000A3 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 10691 000000A5 97                      		xchg	ax, di
 10692 000000A6 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
 10693 000000AA FC                      		cld
 10694                                  		; 17/10/2022
 10695 000000AB 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
 10696                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
 10697 000000AF 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
 10698 000000B1 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
 10699                                  already_got_ah_status:
 10700                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022
 10701                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 10702                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
 10703 000000B3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 10704                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
 10705 000000B8 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 10706 000000BC 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
 10707                                  					; mark operation complete
 10708 000000BF 5B                      		pop	bx
 10709 000000C0 07                      		pop	es
 10710 000000C1 1F                      		pop	ds
 10711 000000C2 5D                      		pop	bp
 10712 000000C3 5F                      		pop	di
 10713 000000C4 5A                      		pop	dx
 10714 000000C5 59                      		pop	cx
 10715 000000C6 58                      		pop	ax
 10716 000000C7 5E                      		pop	si
 10717                                  		;add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
 10718                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1	- IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00C8h)
 10719 000000C8 44                      		inc	sp
 10720 000000C9 44                      		inc	sp	
 10721                                  
 10722                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
 10723                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
 10724                                  bc_retf:
 10725 000000CA CB                      		retf
 10726                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10727                                  
 10728                                  command_error:				
 10729 000000CB E80700                  		call	bc_cmderr
 10730 000000CE EBE3                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
 10731                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10732                                  ; 01/05/2019
 10733                                  
 10734                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10735                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
 10736                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
 10737                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
 10738                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
 10739                                  ; high.
 10740                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10741                                  
 10742                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
 10743                                  
 10744                                  		; 20/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 10745                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0D0h)
 10746                                  		; 15/10/2022
 10747                                  		;dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
 10748                                  
 10749 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
 10750                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
 10751                                  		
 10752                                  
 10753                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10754                                  
 10755                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
 10756                                  
 10757                                  bc_cmderr:				
 10758 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
 10759                                  					; unknown command error
 10760                                  
 10761                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10762                                  
 10763                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
 10764                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
 10765                                  
 10766                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
 10767                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
 10768                                  
 10769                                  bc_err_cnt:	
 10770                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
 10771                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10772 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
 10773 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
 10774                                  					; # of successful i/o's
 10775 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
 10776 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
 10777 000000E2 C3                      		retn
 10778                                  
 10779                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10780                                  
 10781                                  ;Bios_Code ends
 10782                                  
 10783                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10784                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 10785                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10786                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10787                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10788                                  
 10789                                  ; 30/04/2019
 10790                                  
 10791                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
 10792                                  
 10793                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
 10794                                  
 10795                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 10796                                  
 10797                                  ;************************************************************************
 10798                                  ;*									*
 10799                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
 10800                                  ;*									*
 10801                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
 10802                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
 10803                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
 10804                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
 10805                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
 10806                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
 10807                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
 10808                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
 10809                                  ;*									*
 10810                                  ;************************************************************************
 10811                                  
 10812                                  		; 20/09/2023
 10813                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00E3h)
 10814                                  		; 13/12/2022
 10815 000000E3 00                      		db 0
 10816                                  
 10817                                  		; 13/12/2022
 10818 000000E4 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
 10819                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
 10820 000000E5 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
 10821                                  					; 00 init
 10822 000000E7 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
 10823 000000E9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
 10824 000000EB [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
 10825                                  					; 03
 10826 000000ED [5C01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
 10827                                  					; 04
 10828 000000EF [9F01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
 10829                                  					; 05
 10830 000000F1 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
 10831 000000F3 [0802]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
 10832                                  					; 07
 10833 000000F5 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
 10834                                  					; 08
 10835 000000F7 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
 10836 000000F9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
 10837                                  con_table_end:
 10838 000000FB 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
 10839                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
 10840 000000FC [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
 10841 000000FE [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
 10842 00000100 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
 10843 00000102 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
 10844 00000104 [1902]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
 10845                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
 10846 00000106 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
 10847                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
 10848 00000108 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
 10849 0000010A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
 10850 0000010C [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
 10851 0000010E [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
 10852 00000110 [4F02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
 10853 00000112 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
 10854 00000114 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
 10855 00000116 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
 10856 00000118 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
 10857 0000011A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
 10858 0000011C [9402]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
 10859 0000011E [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
 10860 00000120 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
 10861 00000122 [C202]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
 10862 00000124 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
 10863 00000126 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
 10864 00000128 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
 10865 0000012A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
 10866 0000012C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
 10867 0000012E [F702]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
 10868                                  prn_table_end:
 10869 00000130 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
 10870                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
 10871 00000131 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
 10872 00000133 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
 10873 00000135 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
 10874 00000137 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
 10875 00000139 [1203]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
 10876 0000013B [3703]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
 10877 0000013D [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
 10878 0000013F [7803]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
 10879 00000141 [7F03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
 10880 00000143 [7F03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
 10881 00000145 [5703]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
 10882                                  aux_table_end:
 10883 00000147 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
 10884                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
 10885 00000148 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
 10886 0000014A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
 10887 0000014C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
 10888 0000014E [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
 10889 00000150 [E404]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
 10890 00000152 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
 10891 00000154 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
 10892 00000156 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
 10893 00000158 [E503]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
 10894 0000015A [E503]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
 10895                                  tim_table_end:
 10896                                  
 10897                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10898                                  
 10899                                  ;************************************************************************
 10900                                  ;*									*
 10901                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
 10902                                  ;*									*
 10903                                  ;************************************************************************
 10904                                  
 10905                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
 10906                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
 10907 0000015C E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
 10908                                  con_loop:				
 10909 0000015E E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
 10910 00000161 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
 10911 00000162 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
 10912                                  con_exit:				
 10913 00000164 F8                      		clc
 10914 00000165 C3                      		retn
 10915                                  
 10916                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10917                                  
 10918                                  ;************************************************************************
 10919                                  ;*									*
 10920                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
 10921                                  ;*									*
 10922                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
 10923                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
 10924                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
 10925                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
 10926                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
 10927                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
 10928                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
 10929                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
 10930                                  ;*									*
 10931                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
 10932                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
 10933                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
 10934                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
 10935                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
 10936                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
 10937                                  ;*									*
 10938                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
 10939                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
 10940                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
 10941                                  ;*									*
 10942                                  ;************************************************************************
 10943                                  
 10944                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10945                                  chrin:		
 10946 00000166 8A26[7E04]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
 10947 0000016A 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 10948 0000016C 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
 10949 00000170 08C0                    		or	al, al
 10950 00000172 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
 10951 00000174 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
 10952 00000176 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
 10953 00000178 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
 10954 0000017A 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
 10955 0000017D 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
 10956 0000017F B010                    		mov	al, 10h
 10957 00000181 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
 10958                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10959                                  
 10960                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
 10961                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
 10962                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
 10963                                  ;	 goto keyret
 10964                                  ;      else
 10965                                  ;	 set al to zero
 10966                                  ;	 goto alt_save
 10967                                  ;      endif
 10968                                  ;    endif
 10969                                  ;  endif
 10970                                  
 10971                                  alt_ext_chk:
 10972 00000183 803E[7E04]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
 10973 00000188 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
 10974 0000018A 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
 10975 0000018C 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
 10976 0000018E 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 10977 00000190 740C                    		jz	short keyret
 10978 00000192 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 10979 00000194 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
 10980                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10981                                  
 10982                                  not_ext:				
 10983 00000196 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
 10984 00000198 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
 10985                                  alt_save:				
 10986 0000019A 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
 10987                                  keyret:					
 10988 0000019E C3                      		retn
 10989                                  
 10990                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10991                                  
 10992                                  ;************************************************************************
 10993                                  ;*									*
 10994                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
 10995                                  ;*									*
 10996                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
 10997                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
 10998                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
 10999                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
 11000                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
 11001                                  ;*									*
 11002                                  ;************************************************************************
 11003                                  
 11004                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11005                                  con_rdnd:				
 11006 0000019F A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
 11007 000001A2 08C0                    		or	al, al
 11008 000001A4 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
 11009 000001A6 8A26[7F04]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
 11010 000001AA CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
 11011 000001AC 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
 11012 000001AE 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
 11013 000001B3 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
 11014 000001B5 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
 11015                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11016 000001B9 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
 11017                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
 11018 000001BE 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
 11019 000001C0 B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
 11020 000001C3 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
 11021 000001C5 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
 11022                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
 11023                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
 11024                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
 11025                                  z_bus_exit:				
 11026 000001C7 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
 11027 000001C8 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
 11028 000001CA C3                      		retn
 11029                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11030                                  
 11031                                  gotchr:					
 11032 000001CB 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
 11033 000001CD 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
 11034 000001CF 8A26[7E04]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
 11035 000001D3 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
 11036 000001D5 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
 11037                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11038                                  
 11039                                  notbrk:					
 11040 000001D7 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
 11041 000001DA 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
 11042 000001DC B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
 11043 000001DE EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
 11044                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11045                                  
 11046                                  rd_ext_chk:				
 11047 000001E0 803E[7E04]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
 11048 000001E5 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
 11049 000001E7 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
 11050 000001E9 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
 11051 000001EB 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
 11052 000001EE 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
 11053 000001F0 B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
 11054                                  					; change it for	compatibility
 11055                                  rdexit:					
 11056 000001F2 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
 11057 000001F6 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
 11058                                  					; return keyboard character here
 11059                                  bc_exvec:				
 11060 000001FA F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
 11061                                  					; indicate normal termination
 11062 000001FB C3                      		retn
 11063                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11064                                  
 11065                                  ;************************************************************************
 11066                                  ;*									*
 11067                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
 11068                                  ;*									*
 11069                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
 11070                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
 11071                                  ;*									*
 11072                                  ;************************************************************************
 11073                                  
 11074                                  con_writ:
 11075                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
 11076 000001FC E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
 11077                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11078                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
 11079                                  con_lp:					
 11080 000001FE 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
 11081 00000201 47                      		inc	di
 11082 00000202 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
 11083                                  					; AL = character to display
 11084 00000204 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
 11085                                  cc_ret:					
 11086 00000206 F8                      		clc
 11087 00000207 C3                      		retn
 11088                                  
 11089                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11090                                  
 11091                                  ;************************************************************************
 11092                                  ;*									*
 11093                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
 11094                                  ;*									*
 11095                                  ;************************************************************************
 11096                                  
 11097                                  con_flush:
 11098 00000208 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
 11099                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
 11100 0000020D B401                    		mov	ah, 1
 11101 0000020F CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
 11102                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
 11103                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
 11104                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
 11105 00000211 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
 11106 00000213 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 11107 00000215 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
 11108                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
 11109 00000217 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
 11110                                  
 11111                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11112                                  
 11113                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11114                                  
 11115                                  ;************************************************************************
 11116                                  ;*									*
 11117                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
 11118                                  ;*									*
 11119                                  ;************************************************************************
 11120                                  
 11121                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
 11122                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
 11123                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
 11124                                  
 11125                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
 11126                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
 11127                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
 11128                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
 11129                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
 11130                                  ;
 11131                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
 11132                                  
 11133                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11134                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
 11135                                  
 11136                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11137                                  
 11138                                  ;************************************************************************
 11139                                  ;*									*
 11140                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
 11141                                  ;*									*
 11142                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
 11143                                  ;*									*
 11144                                  ;************************************************************************
 11145                                  
 11146                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
 11147 00000219 E8BBFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
 11148                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
 11149                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11150                                  prn_done:
 11151 0000021C F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
 11152 0000021D C3                      		retn
 11153                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11154                                  
 11155                                  ;************************************************************************
 11156                                  ;*									*
 11157                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
 11158                                  ;*									*
 11159                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
 11160                                  ;*									*
 11161                                  ;************************************************************************
 11162                                  
 11163                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
 11164                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
 11165 0000021E E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
 11166                                  prn_loop:				
 11167 00000220 BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
 11168                                  prn_out:				
 11169 00000223 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
 11170 00000226 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
 11171 00000228 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
 11172 0000022B 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 11173 0000022D E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
 11174 00000230 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
 11175 00000232 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
 11176 00000235 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
 11177 00000237 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
 11178 00000239 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
 11179 0000023E EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
 11180                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11181                                  
 11182                                  _prnwf:					
 11183 00000240 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
 11184 00000243 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
 11185                                  TestPrnError:				
 11186 00000245 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
 11187 00000246 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
 11188                                  pmessg:					
 11189 00000248 E98CFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
 11190                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11191                                  
 11192                                  prn_con:				
 11193 0000024B 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
 11194 0000024C E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
 11195                                  ;prn_done:				
 11196                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11197                                  prn_done2:
 11198                                  		;clc
 11199                                  		; cf=0
 11200 0000024E C3                      		retn
 11201                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11202                                  
 11203                                  ;************************************************************************
 11204                                  ;*									*
 11205                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
 11206                                  ;*									*
 11207                                  ;************************************************************************
 11208                                  
 11209                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
 11210 0000024F E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
 11211 00000252 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
 11212 00000254 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
 11213                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
 11214                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11215 00000257 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
 11216 00000259 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
 11217                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11218                                  
 11219                                  ;************************************************************************
 11220                                  ;*									*
 11221                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
 11222                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
 11223                                  ;*									*
 11224                                  ;************************************************************************
 11225                                  
 11226                                  prnstat:				
 11227 0000025C B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
 11228                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
 11229                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
 11230                                  					; Return: AH = status
 11231                                  
 11232                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11233                                  
 11234                                  ;************************************************************************
 11235                                  ;*									*
 11236                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
 11237                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
 11238                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
 11239                                  ;*									*
 11240                                  ;************************************************************************
 11241                                  
 11242                                  prnop:
 11243                                  		; 20/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 11244                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 11245                                  		
 11246                                  		;mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
 11247                                  		;int	17h
 11248                                  
 11249 0000025E 1E                      		push	ds
 11250 0000025F FF36[2100]              		push	word [auxnum]
 11251 00000263 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx ; 0
 11252 00000265 8EDA                    		mov	ds, dx
 11253 00000267 5A                      		pop	dx
 11254 00000268 9C                      		pushf			; simulate int 17h
 11255 00000269 FA                      		cli
 11256                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:5ghghCh
 11257 0000026A FF1E5C00                		call	far [17h*4]	; 0:5Ch = INT 17h vector
 11258 0000026E 1F                      		pop	ds
 11259                                  
 11260                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
 11261                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
 11262                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
 11263                                  
 11264 0000026F 50                      		push	ax
 11265 00000270 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
 11266 00000273 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
 11267 00000276 58                      		pop	ax
 11268 00000277 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
 11269 00000279 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
 11270 0000027C 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
 11271                                  
 11272                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
 11273                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
 11274                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
 11275                                  
 11276                                  NextTest:				
 11277 0000027F F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
 11278                                  					; i/o error?
 11279 00000282 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
 11280                                  
 11281                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
 11282                                  
 11283 00000284 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
 11284                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
 11285 00000286 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
 11286 00000289 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
 11287 0000028B FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
 11288                                  ret1:					
 11289 0000028D C3                      		retn
 11290                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11291                                  
 11292                                  checknotready:				
 11293 0000028E B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
 11294 00000290 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
 11295 00000293 C3                      		retn
 11296                                  
 11297                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11298                                  
 11299                                  ;************************************************************************
 11300                                  ;*									*
 11301                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
 11302                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
 11303                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
 11304                                  ;*									*
 11305                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
 11306                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
 11307                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
 11308                                  ;*									*
 11309                                  ;************************************************************************
 11310                                  
 11311                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11312                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
 11313 00000294 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
 11314                                  prn_tilbloop:				
 11315 00000296 51                      		push	cx
 11316 00000297 53                      		push	bx
 11317 00000298 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
 11318 0000029A 8A1E[8004]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
 11319 0000029E D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
 11320                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
 11321 000002A0 8B8F[8104]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
 11322 000002A4 5B                      		pop	bx
 11323                                  prn_getstat:				
 11324 000002A5 E8B4FF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
 11325 000002A8 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
 11326 000002AA F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
 11327 000002AD E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
 11328 000002AF 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
 11329 000002B0 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
 11330 000002B2 26                      		es
 11331 000002B3 AC                      		lodsb
 11332                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
 11333                                  					; lodsb
 11334 000002B4 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 11335 000002B6 E8A5FF                  		call	prnop
 11336 000002B9 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
 11337 000002BB E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
 11338                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11339                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
 11340                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
 11341 000002BD C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
 11342                                  
 11343                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11344                                  
 11345                                  prn_bperr:				
 11346 000002BE 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
 11347                                  prn_berr:				
 11348 000002BF E915FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
 11349                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11350                                  
 11351                                  ; 15/10/2022

 11353                                  ;************************************************************************
 11354                                  ;*									*
 11355                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
 11356                                  ;*									*
 11357                                  ;************************************************************************
 11358                                  
 11359                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 11360                                  ; 11/01/2019
 11361                                  
 11362                                  ;********************************;*
 11363                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
 11364                                  ;********************************;*
 11365                                  
 11366                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
 11367                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
 11368                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
 11369                                  
 11370                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
 11371                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
 11372                                  ;;endstruc
 11373                                  
 11374                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
 11375                                  
 11376                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11377                                  
 11378                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11379                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
 11380 000002C2 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
 11381 000002C6 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11382                                  					; ioc_pc
 11383 000002CB 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
 11384                                  
 11385                                  prnfuncerr:				
 11386 000002CD E905FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 11387                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11388                                  
 11389                                  prnfunc_ok:				
 11390 000002D0 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11391 000002D4 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11392 000002D8 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
 11393                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
 11394 000002DA 8A1E[8004]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
 11395 000002DE D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
 11396                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
 11397 000002E0 8B8F[8104]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
 11398 000002E4 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
 11399 000002E6 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
 11400 000002E8 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
 11401 000002EA 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
 11402 000002EC 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
 11403                                  prngetcount:				
 11404                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
 11405 000002EF 898F[8104]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
 11406 000002F3 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
 11407                                  					; return current retry count
 11408                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11409                                  		; cf=0
 11410                                  		;clc
 11411 000002F6 C3                      		retn
 11412                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11413                                  
 11414                                  ;************************************************************************
 11415                                  ;*									*
 11416                                  ;*  prn_ioctl_query							*
 11417                                  ;*									*
 11418                                  ;*  Added for 5.00							*
 11419                                  ;************************************************************************
 11420                                  
 11421                                  prn_ioctl_query:			; 2C7h:2F0h = 70h:2860h
 11422 000002F7 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]

 11424                                  					; ioc_pc

 11427 00000306 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; GET_RETRY_COUNT

 11442                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11443                                  
 11444                                  ;************************************************************************
 11445                                  ;*									*
 11446                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
 11447                                  ;*									*
 11448                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
 11449                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
 11450                                  ;*									*
 11451                                  ;************************************************************************
 11452                                  
 11453                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
 11454                                  
 11455                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
 11456                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
 11457                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
 11458                                  
 11459                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
 11460                                  
 11461                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
 11462                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
 11463                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
 11464                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
 11465                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
 11466                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
 11467                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
 11468                                  
 11469                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
 11470                                  
 11471                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
 11472                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
 11473                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
 11474                                  
 11475                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11476                                  
 11477                                  ;************************************************************************
 11478                                  ;*									*
 11479                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
 11480                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
 11481                                  ;*									*
 11482                                  ;************************************************************************
 11483                                  
 11484                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
 11485                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
 11486 00000312 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
 11487 00000314 E88000                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
 11488 00000317 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 11489 00000319 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
 11490 0000031B 08C0                    		or	al, al
 11491 0000031D 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
 11492                                  aux1:					
 11493 0000031F E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
 11494                                  					; won't return if error
 11495                                  aux2:					
 11496 00000322 AA                      		stosb
 11497 00000323 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
 11498                                  exvec2:					
 11499 00000325 F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
 11500                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
 11501 00000326 C3                      		retn
 11502                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11503                                  
 11504                                  ;************************************************************************
 11505                                  ;*									*
 11506                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
 11507                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
 11508                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
 11509                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
 11510                                  ;*									*
 11511                                  ;************************************************************************
 11512                                  
 11513                                  auxin:					
 11514 00000327 B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
 11515 00000329 E83A00                  		call	auxop
 11516 0000032C F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
 11517                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
 11518                                  		;retn
 11519                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
 11520 0000032F 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
 11521                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11522                                  
 11523                                  arbad:					
 11524 00000331 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
 11525                                  		;xor	al, al
 11526                                  		;or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
 11527                                  		; 11/08/2023
 11528 00000332 B0B0                    		mov	al, 0B0h	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0334h
 11529 00000334 E9A0FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
 11530                                  
 11531                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11532                                  
 11533                                  ;************************************************************************
 11534                                  ;*									*
 11535                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
 11536                                  ;*									*
 11537                                  ;************************************************************************
 11538                                  
 11539                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
 11540 00000337 E85D00                  		call	getbx
 11541 0000033A 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
 11542 0000033C 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
 11543 0000033E 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
 11544 00000340 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
 11545 00000343 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
 11546 00000346 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
 11547 00000348 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
 11548 0000034A 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
 11549 0000034C E8D8FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
 11550 0000034F 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
 11551                                  auxdrx:					
 11552 00000351 E99EFE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
 11553                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11554                                  
 11555                                  auxbus:					
 11556 00000354 E970FE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
 11557                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11558                                  
 11559                                  ;************************************************************************
 11560                                  ;*									*
 11561                                  ;*	aux_wrst - return aux port write status				*
 11562                                  ;*									*
 11563                                  ;************************************************************************
 11564                                  
 11565                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h
 11566 00000357 E80A00                  		call	auxstat		; get status of	aux in ax
 11567 0000035A A820                    		test	al, 20h		; test data set	ready
 11568 0000035C 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
 11569 0000035E F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
 11570 00000361 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
 11571                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11572                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
 11573                                  		;clc
 11574 00000363 C3                      		retn
 11575                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11576                                  
 11577                                  ;************************************************************************
 11578                                  ;*									*
 11579                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
 11580                                  ;*									*
 11581                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
 11582                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
 11583                                  ;*									*
 11584                                  ;************************************************************************
 11585                                  
 11586                                  auxstat:				
 11587 00000364 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
 11588                                  
 11589                                  		; fall into auxop
 11590                                  
 11591                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11592                                  
 11593                                  ;************************************************************************
 11594                                  ;*									*
 11595                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
 11596                                  ;*									*
 11597                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
 11598                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
 11599                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
 11600                                  ;*									*
 11601                                  ;************************************************************************
 11602                                  
 11603                                  auxop:		; proc near
 11604                                  		; 20/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 11605                                  		;mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
 11606                                  		;			; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
 11607                                  		;			; get port number
 11608                                  		;
 11609                                  		;int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
 11610                                  		;			; DX = port number (0-3)
 11611                                  		;			; Return: AX = port status code
 11612                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 11613 00000366 1E                      		push	ds
 11614 00000367 FF36[2100]              		push	word [auxnum]
 11615 0000036B 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx ; 0
 11616 0000036D 8EDA                    		mov	ds, dx
 11617 0000036F 5A                      		pop	dx
 11618 00000370 9C                      		pushf			; simulate INT 14h
 11619 00000371 FA                      		cli
 11620                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:50h
 11621 00000372 FF1E5000                		call	far [14h*4]	; INT 14h vector (14h*4 = 50h)
 11622 00000376 1F                      		pop	ds
 11623 00000377 C3                      		retn
 11624                                  
 11625                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11626                                  
 11627                                  ;************************************************************************
 11628                                  ;*									*
 11629                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
 11630                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
 11631                                  ;*									*
 11632                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
 11633                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
 11634                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
 11635                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
 11636                                  ;*									*
 11637                                  ;************************************************************************
 11638                                  
 11639                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
 11640 00000378 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
 11641 0000037B C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
 11642                                  					; zero out buffer
 11643                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
 11644                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11645                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
 11646 0000037E C3                      		retn
 11647                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 11660                                  					; move di pointer to next character

 11667 00000391 E943FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines

 11675                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)
