 13444                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13445                                  
 13446                                  ; 15/10/2022
 13447                                  
 13448                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13449                                  ; read a single sector into the temp buffer.
 13450                                  ; perform three retries in case of error.
 13451                                  ;   inputs:	es:[di].bds_drivenum has physical drive to use
 13452                                  ;		cx has sector and cylinder
 13453                                  ;		dh has head
 13454                                  ;		es:di has bds
 13455                                  ;		ds has Bios_Data
 13456                                  ;
 13457                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 13458                                  ;		    Bios_Data:bx point to sector
 13459                                  ;		       (note: some callers assume location of buffer)
 13460                                  ;
 13461                                  ;		carry set
 13462                                  ;		    ax has rom error code
 13463                                  ;
 13464                                  ; register bp is preserved.
 13465                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13466                                  
 13467                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13468                                  ; 22/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 13469                                  
 13470                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13471                                  read_sector:
 13472 000008B6 55                      		push	bp
 13473 000008B7 BD0300                  		mov	bp, 3		; make 3 attempts
 13474 000008BA 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13475 000008BE BB[5201]                		mov	bx, disksector	; get es:bx to point to	buffer
 13476                                  rd_ret:
 13477 000008C1 06                      		push	es
 13478 000008C2 1E                      		push	ds
 13479 000008C3 07                      		pop	es
 13480 000008C4 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 13481 000008C7 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 13482                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 13483                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 13484                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 13485 000008C9 07                      		pop	es
 13486 000008CA 734A                    		jnb	short okret2
 13487                                  rd_rty:
 13488 000008CC E81205                  		call	again		; reset	disk, decrement	bp, preserve ax
 13489 000008CF 7442                    		jz	short err_rd_ret
 13490                                  
 13491                                  		; 22/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 13492 000008D1 26F6453F01              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 1
 13493                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 13494                                  		;;test	byte ptr [es:di+23h], 1	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13495                                  					; fnon_removable

 13498 000008DD 7510                    		jnz	short rd_skip1_dpt
 13499 000008DF 50                      		push	ax
 13500 000008E0 1E                      		push	ds		; for retry, set the head settle time to 0Fh
 13501 000008E1 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 13502                                  		;mov	al, [si+9]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 13503                                  		;mov	byte [si+9], 15 ; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 13504                                  		;			; NORMSETTLE
 13505                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13506 000008E5 B00F                    		mov	al, 15
 13507 000008E7 864409                  		xchg	al, [si+9]
 13508                                  		; 
 13509 000008EA 1F                      		pop	ds
 13510 000008EB A2[2A01]                		mov	[save_head_sttl], al
 13511 000008EE 58                      		pop	ax
 13512                                  rd_skip1_dpt:
 13513 000008EF 06                      		push	es
 13514 000008F0 1E                      		push	ds
 13515 000008F1 07                      		pop	es
 13516 000008F2 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 13517 000008F5 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 13518                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 13519                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 13520                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 13521 000008F7 07                      		pop	es
 13522 000008F8 9C                      		pushf
 13523 000008F9 803E[A905]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 13524 000008FE 750E                    		jnz	short rd_skip2_dpt
 13525 00000900 50                      		push	ax
 13526 00000901 A0[2A01]                		mov	al, [save_head_sttl]
 13527 00000904 1E                      		push	ds
 13528 00000905 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 13529 00000909 884409                  		mov	[si+9],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 13530 0000090C 1F                      		pop	ds
 13531 0000090D 58                      		pop	ax
 13532                                  rd_skip2_dpt:
 13533 0000090E 9D                      		popf

 13535 00000911 EBB9                    		jmp	short rd_rty

 13538                                  err_rd_ret:

 13663                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 13664                                  ; miscellaneous odd jump routines. 
 13665                                  ; moved out of mainline for speed.
 13666                                  
 13667                                  ; if we have a system where we have virtual drives, we need 
 13668                                  ; to prompt the user to place the correct disk in the drive.
 13669                                  ;
 13670                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds:->Bios_Data
 13671                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 13672                                  
 13673                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13674                                  checksingle:
 13675 00000977 50                      		push	ax
 13676 00000978 53                      		push	bx
 13677                                  		; 22/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 13678 00000979 268B5D3F                		mov	bx, [es:di+3Fh]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13679                                  		;mov	bx, [es:di+23h]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13680                                  
 13681                                  ; if hard drive, cannot change disk.
 13682                                  ; if current owner of physical drive, no need to change diskette.
 13683                                  
 13684 0000097D F6C321                  		test	bl, 21h		; fnon_removable|fi_own_physical
 13685 00000980 7573                    		jnz	short singleret
 13686 00000982 F6C310                  		test	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 13687                                  					; is there a drive sharing this	physical drive?
 13688 00000985 746E                    		jz	short singleret
 13689                                  
 13690                                  ; look for the previous owner of this physical drive
 13691                                  ; and reset its ownership flag.
 13692                                  
 13693 00000987 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13694                                  					; get physical drive number
 13695 0000098B 06                      		push	es		; preserve pointer to current bds
 13696 0000098C 57                      		push	di
 13697 0000098D C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds
 13698                                  scan_list:
 13699 00000991 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al
 13700 00000995 7553                    		jnz	short scan_skip	; Not our drive. Try next bds.
 13701 00000997 B320                    		mov	bl, 20h	; ' '   ; fi_own_physical ; test ownership flag
 13702                                  		; 22/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 13703 00000999 26845D3F                		test	[es:di+3Fh], bl	; [es:di+BDS.flags]

 13708 000009A3 5F                      		pop	di		; restore pointer to current bds

 13712                                  
 13713                                  ; we examine the fsetowner flag. if it is set, then we are using the code in
 13714                                  ; checksingle to just set the owner of a drive. we must not issue the prompt
 13715                                  ; in this case.
 13716 000009A9 803E[7A00]01            		cmp	byte [fsetowner], 1

 13731                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13732                                  
 13733                                  ; to support "backward" compatibility with ibm's "single drive status byte"
 13734                                  ; we now check to see if we are in a single drive system and the application
 13735                                  ; has "cleverly" diddled the sdsb

 13744 000009D6 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 13745 000009DA 2686060405              		xchg	al, [es:LSTDRV]

 13808                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13809                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 13810                                  ;
 13811                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 13812                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 13813                                  ;	cx = sector count
 13814                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 13815                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 13816                                  ;	ds = cs
 13817                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 13818                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 13819                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 13820                                  ;
 13821                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 13822                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 13823                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13824                                  
 13825                                  		; 12/12/2023
 13826                                  		; ds = biosdata segment (cs = bioscode segment)

 13840                                  		mov	bx, di		; es:bx	= transfer address

 13847                                  
 13848                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in

 13850                                  ; go to the error exit at label unformatteddrive.
 13851

 13854                                  					; unformatted_media

 13857                                  		mov	[spsav], sp	; save sp

 13859                                  ; ensure that we are trying to access valid sectors on the drive
 13860

 13879                                  sanity32:

 13893                                  ; save it temporarily to saved_word.

 14673 00000D4A 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 14674 00000D4C 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 14675 00000D4F 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 14676                                  skip_timeout_chk:
 14677 00000D51 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 14678 00000D54 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 14679 00000D56 C706[A504]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 14680                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 14681                                  dskerr1:
 14682 00000D5C 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 14683                                  		;jmp	retry
 14684                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14685 00000D5D E9F1FE                  		jmp	_retry
 14686                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14687                                  
 14688                                  write_fault_err:
 14689 00000D60 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 14690                                  					; for write fault error.
 14691 00000D63 EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 14692                                  
 14693                                  		; fall into harderr

 14696                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves

 14700                                  harderr2:
 14701 00000D68 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 14702                                  					; force a media check through rom
 14703 00000D6D 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 14704 00000D71 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 14705                                  
 14706                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 14707                                  
 14708                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 14709                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14710 00000D75 E951FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 14711                                  
 14712                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14713                                  
 14714                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 14715                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 14716                                  
 14717                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14718                                  normspeed:
 14719 00000D78 803E[A905]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 14720 00000D7D 751D                    		jnz	short fastspeed

 14722 00000D80 50                      		push	ax
 14723 00000D81 A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 14724 00000D84 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 14725 00000D88 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 14726 00000D8C 58                      		pop	ax
 14727 00000D8D 07                      		pop	es
 14728 00000D8E E80B00                  		call	fastspeed
 14729                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14730                                  		;push	es
 14731                                  		;les	si, [dpt]
 14732                                  		;mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 14733                                  		;			; 1 is fast settle value
 14734                                  		;pop	es
 14735 00000D91 1E                      		push	ds
 14736 00000D92 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 14737 00000D96 C6440901                		mov	byte [si+9], 1
 14738 00000D9A 1F                      		pop	ds
 14739                                  
 14740 00000D9B C3                      		retn
 14741                                  
 14742                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14743                                  
 14744                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 14745                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 14746                                  
 14747                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 14748                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0DDDh)
 14749                                  fastspeed:
 14750                                  		;;test	byte [es:di+3Bh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 14751                                  		;test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 14752                                  		;			; ftoobig
 14753                                  		;jnz	short notready
 14754 00000D9C 06                      		push	es
 14755 00000D9D 8E06[A804]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 14756 00000DA1 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 14757 00000DA3 8C06[A804]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 14758 00000DA7 07                      		pop	es
 14759 00000DA8 C3                      		retn

 14762                                  ;notready:

 14765                                  		;retn
 14766                                  
 14767                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14768                                  
 14769                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 14770                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 14771                                  
 14772                                  maperror:
 14773 00000DA9 51                      		push	cx
 14774 00000DAA 06                      		push	es
 14775 00000DAB 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 14776 00000DAC 07                      		pop	es
 14777 00000DAD 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 14778 00000DAF A2[4601]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 14779                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14780 00000DB2 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 02/09/2023
 14781                                  		;mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 14782                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 14783 00000DB5 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 14784 00000DB8 F2AE                    		repne scasb
 14785                                  
 14786                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14787                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14788 00000DBA 8A450A                  		mov	al, [di+10] ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 14789                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14790                                  		;mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 14791                                  					; get translation
 14792                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 14793                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 14794 00000DBD 07                      		pop	es
 14795 00000DBE 59                      		pop	cx
 14796 00000DBF F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 14797 00000DC0 C3                      		retn
 14798                                  
 14799                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14800                                  
 14801                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 14802                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 14803                                  
 14804                                  set_tim:
 14805 00000DC1 50                      		push	ax
 14806 00000DC2 E86CF7                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 14807                                  
 14808                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 14809                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 14810                                  
 14811                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 14812 00000DC5 263B5579                		cmp	dx, [es:di+79h]	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 14813                                  		;cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 14814 00000DC9 7506                    		jne	short setaccess
 14815                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14816 00000DCB 263B4D7B                		cmp	cx, [es:di+7Bh]	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 14817                                  		;cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 14818                                  		;jz	short done_set
 14819                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14820 00000DCF 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 14821                                  setaccess:
 14822 00000DD1 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 14823                                  		
 14824                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 14825 00000DD6 26895579                		mov	[es:di+79h], dx
 14826 00000DDA 26894D7B                		mov	[es:di+7Bh], cx
 14827                                  		;mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 14828                                  		;mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 14829                                  done_set:
 14830 00000DDE F8                      		clc
 14831                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 14832 00000DDF 58                      		pop	ax
 14833 00000DE0 C3                      		retn
 14834                                  
 14835                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14836                                  
 14837                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 14838                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 14839                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 14840                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 14841                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 14842                                  
 14843                                  again:
 14844 00000DE1 E85705                  		call	ResetDisk
 14845 00000DE4 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14846 00000DE7 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 14847                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 14848 00000DE9 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 14849 00000DEA C3                      		retn
 14850                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14851                                  
 14852                                  dont_dec_retry_count:
 14853 00000DEB 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 14854 00000DED C3                      		retn
 14855

 14862 00000DEE 00                      ioctl_drvnum:	db 0

 14867                                  
 14868                                  get_phy_drv_num:
 14869 00000DEF E8B2F7                  		call	SetDrive	; get physical drive number
 14870                                  					; INPUT: al = logical drive number (BDS.drivelet)
 14871                                  					; OUTPUT: physical drive number (BDS.drivenum)
 14872 00000DF2 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14873 00000DF6 C3                      		retn

 14875                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 14876                                  
 14877                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14878                                  ioctl_output:
 14879 00000DF7 E8F5FF                  		call	get_phy_drv_num
 14880 00000DFA 2E8816[EE0D]            		mov	[cs:ioctl_drvnum], dl
 14881 00000DFF B441                    		mov	ah, 41h
 14882 00000E01 BBAA55                  		mov	bx, 55AAh
 14883 00000E04 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - Check for INT 13h Extensions
 14884                                  					; BX = 55AAh, DL = drive number
 14885                                  					; Return: CF set if not supported
 14886                                  					; AH = extensions version
 14887                                  					; BX = AA55h
 14888                                  					; CX = Interface support bit map
 14889 00000E06 7235                    		jc	short int13h_exts_err
 14890                                  ioctl_input_1:
 14891 00000E08 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
 14892 00000E0C 26C47D0E                		les	di, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 14893 00000E10 723E                    		jc	short ioctl_input_2
 14894 00000E12 B80046                  		mov	ax, 4600h	; Eject removable media
 14895 00000E15 263805                  		cmp	[es:di], al	; al = 0 ; disk ioctl function = 0
 14896 00000E18 7417                    		je	short ioctl_output_1
 14897 00000E1A 26803D01                		cmp	byte [es:di], 1 ; al = 1 ; disk ioctl function = 1
 14898 00000E1E 751B                    		jne	short ioctl_output_2
 14899 00000E20 B80145                  		mov	ax, 4501h	; Lock/unlock media
 14900                                  					; (al, 0 = lock, 1 = unlock)
 14901 00000E23 26807D0100              		cmp	byte [es:di+1], 0 ; unlock (reverse of INT 13h ah=45h)
 14902 00000E28 7407                    		jz	short ioctl_output_1
 14903 00000E2A 26384501                		cmp	[es:di+1], al	; lock (reverse of INT 13h ah=45h)
 14904 00000E2E 750B                    		jne	short ioctl_output_2
 14905 00000E30 48                      		dec	ax
 14906                                  ioctl_output_1:
 14907 00000E31 2E8A16[EE0D]            		mov	dl, [cs:ioctl_drvnum]
 14908 00000E36 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - IBM/MS Extension - LOCK/UNLOCK DRIVE (DL - drive, [SI - disk address packet)
 14909 00000E38 7203                    		jc	short int13h_exts_err
 14910                                  ioctl_lock_err:
 14911                                  		; cf=0
 14912                                  ioctl_output_ret:
 14913                                  		;clc
 14914 00000E3A C3                      		retn
 14915                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14916                                  
 14917                                  ioctl_output_2:
 14918 00000E3B B401                    		mov	ah, 1
 14919                                  int13h_exts_err:
 14920 00000E3D 80FCB0                  		cmp	ah, 0B0h	; volume not locked in drive
 14921 00000E40 74F8                    		je	short ioctl_lock_err
 14922 00000E42 80FCB4                  		cmp	ah, 0B4h	; lock count exceeded
 14923 00000E45 74F3                    		je	short ioctl_lock_err
 14924 00000E47 E9DAF7                  		jmp	err_exitj
 14925                                  
 14926                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 14927                                  
 14928                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14929                                  ioctl_input:
 14930 00000E4A E8A2FF                  		call	get_phy_drv_num
 14931 00000E4D F9                      		stc
 14932 00000E4E EBB8                    		jmp	short ioctl_input_1
 14933                                  ioctl_input_2:
 14934 00000E50 26803D06                		cmp	byte [es:di], 6	; disk ioctl function = 6
 14935 00000E54 75E5                    		jne	short ioctl_output_2
 14936 00000E56 B80245                  		mov	ax, 4502h	; get lock status
 14937 00000E59 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - IBM/MS Extension - LOCK/UNLOCK DRIVE (DL - drive, [SI - disk address packet)
 14938 00000E5B 72E0                    		jc	short int13h_exts_err
 14939 00000E5D BB0C00                  		mov	bx, 0Ch		; bit 1 lock bit
 14940 00000E60 3C00                    		cmp	al, 0		; not locked
 14941 00000E62 7402                    		jz	short ioctl_input_3
 14942 00000E64 B30E                    		mov	bl, 0Eh
 14943                                  ioctl_input_3:
 14944 00000E66 53                      		push	bx
 14945 00000E67 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 14946 00000E69 B90101                  		mov	cx, 101h
 14947 00000E6C B601                    		mov	dh, 1
 14948 00000E6E CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - VERIFY SECTORS
 14949                                  					; AL = number of sectors to verify, CH = track, CL = sector
 14950                                  					; DH = head, DL = drive
 14951                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH = status
 14952                                  					; AL = number of sectors verified
 14953 00000E70 5B                      		pop	bx
 14954 00000E71 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; no media in drive (IBM/MS INT 13 extensions)
 14955 00000E74 740B                    		je	short ioctl_input_5
 14956 00000E76 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout (not ready)
 14957 00000E79 7406                    		je	short ioctl_input_5
 14958                                  ioctl_input_4:
 14959 00000E7B 26895D01                		mov	[es:di+1], bx
 14960 00000E7F EBB9                    		jmp	short ioctl_lock_err
 14961                                  ioctl_input_5:
 14962 00000E81 81CB0108                		or	bx, 801h	; bit 0 error bit (1 = error, 31h or 80h)
 14963                                  					; bit 11 (not ready -removable media error- bit)
 14964                                  					; if bit 11 = 0, another error (except 31h and 80h)
 14965 00000E85 EBF4                    		jmp	short ioctl_input_4

 15109                                  ;
 15110                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 15111                                  ;
 15112                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates

 15494 0000104F 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 15495                                  		;mov	es, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 15496                                  					; Trash	our bds	pointer
 15497                                  StoreSectorInfo:
 15498 00001054 47                      		inc	di
 15499 00001055 47                      		inc	di		; Skip over cylinder and head
 15500 00001056 AD                      		lodsw			; Get sector id
 15501 00001057 AA                      		stosb			; Copy it
 15502 00001058 AD                      		lodsw			; Get sector size
 15503                                  		
 15504                                  		; 24/12/2023
 15505                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15506                                  		;call	SectSizeToSectIndex
 15507                                  		; 18/04/2024
 15508                                  		;cmp	ah, 3 ; 02/09/2023
 15509 00001059 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024)
 15510                                  					; examine upper	byte only
 15511 0000105C 7704                    		ja	short OneK
 15512 0000105E 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 15513 00001060 EB02                    		jmp	short sdp_s
 15514                                  OneK:
 15515 00001062 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 1024 bytes per sector
 15516                                  sdp_s:
 15517 00001064 AA                      		stosb			; Store	sector SIZE index
 15518 00001065 E2ED                    		loop	StoreSectorInfo
 15519                                  SectorInfoSaved:
 15520 00001067 F8                      		clc
 15521 00001068 C3                      		retn
 15522                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15523                                  
 15524                                  TooManyPerTrack:
 15525 00001069 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch
 15526 0000106B F9                      		stc
 15527 0000106C C3                      		retn
 15528                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15529                                  
 15530                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15531                                  
 15532                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15533                                  ; FormatTrack:
 15534                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 15535                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 15536                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 15537                                  ;
 15538                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 15539                                  ;
 15540                                  ; output:
 15541                                  ;	for status call:
 15542                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 15543                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 15544                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 15545                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 15546                                  ;		3 - no media present
 15547                                  ;	carry cleared.
 15548                                  ;
 15549                                  ;	for format track:
 15550                                  ;		carry set if error
 15551                                  ;
 15552                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15553                                  
 15554                                  ; 16/03/2019
 15555                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 15556                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:10B7h)
 15557                                  
 15558                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15559                                  FormatTrack:
 15560 0000106D C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15561 00001071 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET
 15562 00001074 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 15563                                  					; STATUS_FOR_FORMAT
 15564 00001077 740E                    		jz	short DoFormatTrack
 15565 00001079 1E                      		push	ds
 15566                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15567 0000107A 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 15568                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 15569 0000107F E82502                  		call	SetMediaForFormat ; Also moves current Dpt to TempDpt
 15570 00001082 1F                      		pop	ds
 15571 00001083 8807                    		mov	[bx], al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 15572 00001085 F8                      		clc
 15573 00001086 C3                      		retn
 15574                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15575                                  
 15576                                  DoFormatTrack:
 15577                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 15578 00001087 26807D3E05              		cmp	byte [es:di+3Eh], 5				
 15579                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+34], 5 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15580                                  					; DEV_HARDDISK
 15581 0000108C 7508                    		jnz	short DoFormatDiskette
 15582                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15583 0000108E 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 15584                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 15585                                  					; Point	to Bios_Data (at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h)
 15586 00001093 E99D00                  		jmp	VerifyTrack
 15587                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15588                                  
 15589                                  DoFormatDiskette:
 15590 00001096 8B4F01                  		mov	cx, [bx+1]
 15591 00001099 8B5703                  		mov	dx, [bx+3]
 15592 0000109C F60702                  		test	byte [bx], 2
 15593                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15594 0000109F 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 15595                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 15596                                  					; Setup	ds-> Bios_Data for verify
 15597 000010A4 7403                    		jz	short DoFormatDiskette_1
 15598 000010A6 E9E500                  		jmp	VerifyTrack_Err
 15599                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15600                                  
 15601                                  DoFormatDiskette_1:
 15602 000010A9 E8FB01                  		call	SetMediaForFormat ; Also moves current Dpt to TempDpt
 15603 000010AC 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1		;  ROM support for sec/trk,# trks comb?
 15604 000010AE 7406                    		jz	short NeedToSetDasd ; Old rom
 15605 000010B0 3C03                    		cmp	al, 3		; Time out error?
 15606 000010B2 7507                    		jnz	short NoSetDasd	; No,fine. (at this point, don't care
 15607                                  					; about	the illegal combination)
 15608 000010B4 EB68                    		jmp	short FormatFailed
 15609                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15610                                  
 15611                                  NeedToSetDasd:
 15612 000010B6 52                      		push	dx
 15613 000010B7 E89001                  		call	SetDasd		; INT 13h, AH=17h
 15614 000010BA 5A                      		pop	dx
 15615                                  NoSetDasd:
 15616 000010BB E8B9F8                  		call	checksingle	; Do any needed	diskette swapping
 15617 000010BE 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx		; Get track from packet
 15618 000010C0 A3[3901]                		mov	[trknum], ax
 15619 000010C3 880E[3801]              		mov	[hdnum], cl	; Store	head from packet
 15620 000010C7 88CC                    		mov	ah, cl
 15621 000010C9 BB[AC04]                		mov	bx, tracktable
 15622 000010CC 8B0E[AA04]              		mov	cx, [sectorspertrack]
 15623                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 15624 000010D0 E307                    		jcxz	set_fmt_retry_count
 15625                                  StoreCylinderHead:
 15626 000010D2 8907                    		mov	[bx], ax	; Store	into TrackTable
 15627 000010D4 83C304                  		add	bx, 4		; Skip to next sector field
 15628 000010D7 E2F9                    		loop	StoreCylinderHead
 15629                                  set_fmt_retry_count:	; 24/12/2023
 15630                                  		;mov	cx, 5		; MAXERR - Set up retry	count
 15631                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15632 000010D9 B105                    		mov	cl, 5
 15633                                  FormatRetry:
 15634 000010DB 51                      		push	cx
 15635 000010DC BB[AC04]                		mov	bx, tracktable
 15636 000010DF A0[AA04]                		mov	al, [sectorspertrack]
 15637 000010E2 B405                    		mov	ah, 5		; romformat
 15638 000010E4 8C1E[A804]              		mov	[xfer_seg], ds
 15639 000010E8 E86602                  		call	ToRom
 15640 000010EB 59                      		pop	cx
 15641 000010EC 7216                    		jb	short FormatError
 15642 000010EE 51                      		push	cx		; Now verify the sectors just formatted.
 15643                                  					; NOTE:	because	of bug in some BIOSes we have to
 15644                                  					;	set ES:BX to 00:00
 15645 000010EF 53                      		push	bx
 15646 000010F0 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
 15647 000010F2 891E[A804]              		mov	[xfer_seg], bx
 15648 000010F6 A0[AA04]                		mov	al, [sectorspertrack]
 15649 000010F9 B404                    		mov	ah, 4		; romverify
 15650 000010FB B101                    		mov	cl, 1
 15651 000010FD E85102                  		call	ToRom
 15652 00001100 5B                      		pop	bx
 15653 00001101 59                      		pop	cx
 15654 00001102 7329                    		jnb	short FormatOk
 15655                                  FormatError:
 15656 00001104 E83402                  		call	ResetDisk
 15657 00001107 C606[AA05]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1
 15658 0000110C 50                      		push	ax
 15659 0000110D 51                      		push	cx
 15660 0000110E 52                      		push	dx
 15661 0000110F E89501                  		call	SetMediaForFormat
 15662 00001112 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1
 15663 00001114 7503                    		jnz	short WhileErr
 15664 00001116 E83101                  		call	SetDasd
 15665                                  WhileErr:
 15666 00001119 5A                      		pop	dx
 15667 0000111A 59                      		pop	cx
 15668 0000111B 58                      		pop	ax
 15669 0000111C E2BD                    		loop	FormatRetry
 15670                                  FormatFailed:
 15671 0000111E C606[AA05]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1
 15672                                  					; Set the format error flag
 15673 00001123 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6		; DSK_CHANGELINE_ERR - convert change line
 15674 00001126 7502                    		jnz	short DoMapIt	; Error	to time	out error
 15675 00001128 B480                    		mov	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR
 15676                                  DoMapIt:
 15677 0000112A E97CFC                  		jmp	maperror
 15678                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15679                                  
 15680                                  FormatOk:
 15681 0000112D C606[AA05]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; reset the format error flag
 15682 00001132 C3                      		retn
 15683                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15684                                  
 15685                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15686                                  
 15687                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15688                                  ;
 15689                                  ; VerifyTrack:
 15690                                  ;
 15691                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 15692                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15693                                  
 15694                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 15695                                  VerifyTrack:
 15696 00001133 1E                      		push	ds
 15697 00001134 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX points to request header.
 15698 00001138 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 15699                                  
 15700                                  		; Come here with DS:[BX] -> packet, ES:[DI] -> bds
 15701                                  
 15702 0000113B 8B4F03                  		mov	cx, [bx+3]	; [bx+A_VERIFYPACKET.VP_CYLINDER]
 15703 0000113E 8B4701                  		mov	ax, [bx+1]	; [bx+A_VERIFYPACKET.VP_HEAD]
 15704 00001141 8B5705                  		mov	dx, [bx+5]	; [bx+A_FORMATPACKET.FP_TRACKCOUNT]
 15705 00001144 8A1F                    		mov	bl, [bx]	; [bx+A_FORMATPACKET.FP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 15706                                  					; Get option flag word
 15707 00001146 1F                      		pop	ds
 15708 00001147 C606[2001]04            		mov	byte [rflag], 4	; romverify
 15709 0000114C 890E[3301]              		mov	[curtrk], cx
 15710 00001150 A2[3201]                		mov	[curhd], al	; ASSUME heads < 256
 15711 00001153 8B0E[AA04]              		mov	cx, [sectorspertrack]
 15712                                  
 15713                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 15714                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 15715                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 15716                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 15717                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 15718                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 15719                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 15720                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 15721                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 15722                                  		; we initialise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 15723                                  		; register.
 15724                                  
 15725                                  					; Special function requested?	
 15726 00001157 F6C302                  		test	bl, 2		; DO_FAST_FORMAT
 15727 0000115A 7421                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 15728 0000115C 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx		; Get ax = number of trks to verify
 15729 0000115E 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 15730 00001160 752C                    		jnz	short VerifyTrack_Err ; #tracks > 255
 15731 00001162 F6E1                    		mul	cl
 15732 00001164 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 15733 00001166 7526                    		jnz	short VerifyTrack_Err ; #sectors > 255	
 15734 00001168 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
 15735                                  		; 24/12/2023
 15736 0000116A 26F6453F01              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 1 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 15737                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15738                                  		;test	byte [es:di+35], 1
 15739                                  		;;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15740                                  					; fnon_removable
 15741 0000116F 740C                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 15742                                  					; Multitrack operation = on?
 15743                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15744                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15745 00001171 F606[A004]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 15746                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 15747                                  		;;test	ds:multrk_flag,	80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 15748 00001176 7405                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 15749 00001178 C606[A704]01            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1
 15750                                  NormVerifyTrack:
 15751 0000117D 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; 1st sector
 15752 0000117F 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
 15753 00001181 891E[A804]              		mov	[xfer_seg], bx	; Use 0:0 as the transfer address for verify
 15754 00001185 E83F00                  		call	TrackIo
 15755 00001188 C606[A704]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0
 15756 0000118D C3                      		retn
 15757                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15758                                  
 15759                                  VerifyTrack_Err:
 15760 0000118E B401                    		mov	ah, 1
 15761 00001190 E916FC                  		jmp	maperror
 15762                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15763                                  
 15764                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15765                                  
 15766                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15767                                  ;
 15768                                  ; ReadTrack:
 15769                                  ;
 15770                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 15771                                  ;
 15772                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15773                                  
 15774                                  ReadTrack:
 15775 00001193 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 15776 00001198 EB05                    		jmp	short ReadWriteTrack
 15777                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15778                                  
 15779                                  WriteTrack:
 15780                                  
 15781                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15782                                  ;
 15783                                  ; WriteTrack:
 15784                                  ;
 15785                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 15786                                  ;
 15787                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15788                                  				
 15789 0000119A C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 15790                                  
 15791                                  		; Fall into ReadWriteTrack
 15792                                  
 15793                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15794                                  ;
 15795                                  ; readWriteTrack:
 15796                                  ;
 15797                                  ; input:
 15798                                  ;    ES:di points to bds for drive
 15799                                  ;    rFlag - 2 for read,3 for write
 15800                                  ;
 15801                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15802                                  
 15803                                  ReadWriteTrack:	
 15804                                  		; save bds pointer segment so we can use it to access
 15805                                  		; our packet. Notice that this is not the standard register
 15806                                  		; assignment for accessing packets
 15807                                  		
 15808                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15809 0000119F 06                      		push	es
 15810 000011A0 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	-> to request header
 15811 000011A4 26C45F13                		les	bx, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 15812 000011A8 268B4703                		mov	ax, [es:bx+3]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_CYLINDER]
 15813 000011AC A3[3301]                		mov	[curtrk], ax
 15814 000011AF 268B4701                		mov	ax, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_HEAD]
 15815 000011B3 A2[3201]                		mov	[curhd], al	; Assume heads < 256!!!
 15816 000011B6 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_FIRSTSECTOR]
 15817 000011BA 268B4F07                		mov	cx, [es:bx+7]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_SECTORSTOREADWRITE]
 15818 000011BE 26C45F09                		les	bx, [es:bx+9]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_TRANSFERADDRESS]
 15819                                  					; Get transfer address
 15820                                  
 15821                                  		; we just trashed our packet address, but we no longer care
 15822                                  
 15823 000011C2 8C06[A804]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; Pass transfer	segment
 15824 000011C6 07                      		pop	es
 15825                                  
 15826                                  		; Fall into TrackIo
 15827                                  
 15828                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15829                                  
 15830                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 15831                                  
 15832                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15833                                  ;
 15834                                  ; TrackIo:
 15835                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 15836                                  ;
 15837                                  ;   input:
 15838                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 15839                                  ;		  3 = write
 15840                                  ;		  4 = verify
 15841                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 15842                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 15843                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 15844                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 15845                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 15846                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 15847                                  ;
 15848                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15849                                  
 15850                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15851                                  
 15852                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0		
 15853                                  
 15854                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15855                                  TrackIo:
 15856                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 15857 000011C7 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 15858 000011CB E8A9F7                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 15859 000011CE 803E[A905]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 15860                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 15861 000011D3 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 15862 000011D5 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 15863 000011D6 51                      		push	cx
 15864 000011D7 E8A0F9                  		call	iosetup
 15865 000011DA 59                      		pop	cx
 15866 000011DB 58                      		pop	ax
 15867                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 15868 000011DC BE[AC04]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 15869                                  		; 24/12/2023
 15870                                  		;add	ax, ax		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 15871                                  		;add	ax, ax
 15872 000011DF D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 15873 000011E1 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 15874 000011E3 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 15875                                  
 15876                                  		; WE WANT:
 15877                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 15878                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 15879                                  		
 15880 000011E5 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 15881                                  
 15882                                  		; 24/12/2023
 15883 000011E8 26F6453F08              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 8 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 15884                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15885                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 15886                                  		;;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15887                                  					; good_tracklayout
 15888 000011ED 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 15889                                  		
 15890 000011EF 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 15891                                  ionextsector:
 15892 000011F1 51                      		push	cx
 15893 000011F2 52                      		push	dx
 15894 000011F3 46                      		inc	si
 15895 000011F4 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 15896                                  					; the track table
 15897 000011F5 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 15898 000011F6 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 15899                                  
 15900                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 15901                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 15902                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 15903                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 15904                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 15905                                  		
 15906                                  		; 24/12/2023
 15907 000011F9 26F6453F01              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 1 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 15908                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15909                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 15910                                  		;;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15911                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 15912 000011FE 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 15913                                  
 15914                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15915 00001200 F606[A004]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 15916                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 15917                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 15918 00001205 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 15919 00001207 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 15920 0000120B 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 15921 0000120D E823FA                  		call	Disk
 15922 00001210 5A                      		pop	dx
 15923 00001211 59                      		pop	cx
 15924 00001212 F8                      		clc
 15925 00001213 C3                      		retn
 15926                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15927                                  
 15928                                  IoRemovable:
 15929 00001214 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 15930                                  					; table	and save it
 15931 00001215 50                      		push	ax
 15932 00001216 56                      		push	si
 15933 00001217 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 15934 00001218 50                      		push	ax
 15935 00001219 8A26[2C01]              		mov	ah, [eot]	; Preserve whatever might be in	ah
 15936                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 15937 0000121D C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 15938 00001221 884403                  		mov	[si+3],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 15939 00001224 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 15940 00001227 58                      		pop	ax
 15941 00001228 1F                      		pop	ds
 15942 00001229 88D0                    		mov	al, dl

 15946                                  					; sector size

 15972                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15973                                  
 15974                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15975                                  ;
 15976                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 15977                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 15978                                  ; are permissible.
 15979                                  ;
 15980                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 15981                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 15982                                  ; All other registers preserved
 15983                                  ;
 15984                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 16015                                  ; SetDASD
 16016                                  ;

 16099 00001298 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 16100 0000129C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 16101                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 16102                                  DasdHasBeenSet:

 16107                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16108                                  
 16109                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16110                                  
 16111                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16112                                  ;
 16113                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 16114                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 16115                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 16116                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 16117                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 16118                                  ;
 16119                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 16120                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 16121                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 16122                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 16123                                  ;
 16124                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 16125                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 16126                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 16127                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 16128                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 16129                                  ;
 16130                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16131                                  
 16132                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16133                                  
 16134                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16135                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 16136 000012A7 51                      		push	cx
 16137 000012A8 52                      		push	dx
 16138                                  
 16139                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 16140                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 16141                                  
 16142 000012A9 803E[AA05]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 16143 000012AE 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 16144 000012B0 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 16145 000012B2 803E[A905]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 16146 000012B7 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 16147 000012B9 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 16148                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16149                                  
 16150                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:
 16151 000012BB 06                      		push	es
 16152 000012BC 56                      		push	si
 16153                                  
 16154                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16155                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 16156 000012BD 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 16157 000012BF 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 16158                                  
 16159 000012C1 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 16160                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 16161                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 16162 000012C6 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 16163 000012CA 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 16164                                  
 16165                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 16166                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 16167                                  
 16168 000012CE 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 16169 000012D3 5E                      		pop	si
 16170 000012D4 07                      		pop	es
 16171                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:
 16172                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16173 000012D5 268B4D41                		mov	cx, [es:di+41h]	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 16174                                  		;mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 16175 000012D9 49                      		dec	cx
 16176 000012DA 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 16177 000012DD D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 16178 000012DF D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 16179 000012E1 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 16180 000012E3 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 16181 000012E7 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 16182 000012EB 06                      		push	es
 16183 000012EC 1E                      		push	ds
 16184 000012ED 56                      		push	si
 16185 000012EE 57                      		push	di
 16186 000012EF B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 16187 000012F1 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 16188                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 16189 000012F3 7231                    		jc	short FormaStatErr
 16190 000012F5 803E[AA05]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 16191 000012FA 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 16192 000012FC 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 16193                                  
 16194                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16195                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 16196 000012FD 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 16197 000012FF 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 16198 00001301 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 16199                                  
 16200 00001302 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 16201                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 16202                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 16203 00001307 8936[AB05]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 16204 0000130B 8C06[AD05]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 16205                                  
 16206                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16207                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 16208                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 16209                                  		;mov	es, si
 16210 0000130F 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 16211                                  
 16212                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 16213 00001310 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 16214                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 16215 00001315 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 16216 0000131A C606[A905]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 16217                                  skip_disk_base_setting:
 16218 0000131F 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 16219                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 16220 00001321 A2[AA05]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 16221 00001324 EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet
 16222                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16223

 16229                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 16230 0000132B 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 16231 0000132D 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR

 16233                                  		; 10/12/2022

 16249                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.

 16251                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet

 16253

 16269                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16270                                  
 16271                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16272                                  
 16273                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16274                                  ;
 16275                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 16276                                  ;
 16277                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 16278                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 16279                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 16280                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 16281                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 16282                                  ;
 16283                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16284                                  
 16285                                  ResetDisk:
 16286 0000133B 50                      		push	ax
 16287                                  
 16288                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16289 0000133C B80100                  		mov	ax, 1 ; PCDOS 7.1
 16290 0000133F 3806[A905]              		cmp	[media_set_for_format], al ; 1
 16291                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 16292                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 16293 00001343 7503                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 16294                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 16295                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 16296 00001345 A2[AA05]                		mov	[had_format_error], al ; 1
 16297                                  ResetDisk_cont:
 16298                                  		; 02/09/2023 (ah=0)
 16299                                  		;xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 16300 00001348 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 16301                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 16302 0000134A C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 16303                                  					; Zap up the speed
 16304 0000134F 58                      		pop	ax
 16305 00001350 C3                      		retn
