 16307                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16308                                  
 16309                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16310                                  
 16311                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16312                                  ;
 16313                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 16314                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 16315                                  ;
 16316                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 16317                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 16318                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 16319                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 16320                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 16321                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 16322                                  ;
 16323                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 16324                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 16325                                  ;
 16326                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16327                                  
 16328                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16329                                  
 16330                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16331                                  ToRom:
 16332 00001351 53                      		push	bx
 16333 00001352 56                      		push	si
 16334                                  
 16335                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 16336                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 16337                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 16338                                  
 16339 00001353 F606[A905]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 16340 00001358 7534                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 16341 0000135A 50                      		push	ax
 16342 0000135B 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 16343                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16344 0000135C 26807D3E02              		cmp	byte [es:di+3Eh], 2
 16345                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16346                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 16347                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16348                                  		;pushf	; not necessary	; (Save	the cmp	result)
 16349 00001361 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 16350                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 16351 00001365 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 16352                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 16353                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 16354 0000136A 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 16355 0000136E 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 16356                                  		
 16357 00001372 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 16358 00001375 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 16359 00001379 A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 16360 0000137C 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 16361                                  					; Important for	format
 16362 00001380 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 16363                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 16364                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 16365                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16366                                  		;popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 16367 00001385 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 16368 00001387 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 16369                                  MotorStrtOK:
 16370 0000138C 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 16371 0000138D 58                      		pop	ax
 16372                                  GotValidDpt:
 16373 0000138E 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 16374 00001392 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 16375 00001394 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 16376 00001398 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 16377 0000139C 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 16378 0000139D 8E06[A804]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 16379 000013A1 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 16380 000013A3 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 16381 000013A4 5E                      		pop	si
 16382 000013A5 5B                      		pop	bx
 16383 000013A6 C3                      		retn
 16384                                  
 16385                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16386                                  
 16387                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 16388                                  ; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 16389                                  
 16390                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 16391                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1404h
 16392                                  
 16393                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16394                                  ;
 16395                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 16396                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 16397                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 16398                                  ;
 16399                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16400                                  
 16401                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16402

 16532                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16533                                  ;	get media id
 16534                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16535                                  ;
 16536                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 16537                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 16538                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 16539                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 16540                                  ;
 16541                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 16542                                  ;
 16543                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 16544                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 16545                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 16546                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 16547                                  ;
 16548                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 16549                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 16550                                  ;
 16551                                  ; LOGIC:
 16552                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 16553                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 16554                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 16555                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 16556                                  ;
 16557                                  ; {
 16558                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 16559                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 16560                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 16561                                  ;	if (no error) then
 16562                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 16563                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 16564                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 16565                                  ;		};
 16566                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 16567                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 16568                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 16569                                  ;		};
 16570                                  ;	else
 16571                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 16572                                  ;
 16573                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16574                                  
 16575                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 16576                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 16577                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 16578                                  
 16579                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16580                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1478h)
 16581                                  
 16582                                  		; 19/10/2022

 16595                                  
 16596                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16597                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16598                                  		;mov	si, disksector+26h
 16599                                  		;;;
 16600                                  		; 24/12/2023

 16603 0000142D 833E[6801]00            		cmp	word [disksector+16h], 0 ; BPB.FATSz16
 16604 00001432 7403                    		jz	short IOCtl_If3 ; FAT32 fs
 16605 00001434 83EE1C                  		sub	si, 1Ch         ; FAT (12-16) fs ; 43h-1Ch = 27h ; BS_VolID
 16606                                  		; si = disksector+26h = BS_BootSig ; 24/12/2023
 16607                                  IOCtl_If3:
 16608                                  		;cmp	byte [si-1], 29h ; BS_BootSig or BS_FAT32_BootSig
 16609                                  		;;;

 16612                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 16613 0000143A 7512                    		jne	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 16614 0000143C C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 16615 00001440 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]

 16629

 16650                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16651                                  ;  set media id
 16652                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16653                                  
 16654                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 16655                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 16656                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 16657                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 16658                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 16659                                  ;	    the bds table.
 16660                                  ;
 16661                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 16662                                  ;
 16663                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 16664                                  ;	    the request packet.
 16665                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 16666                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 16667                                  ;
 16668                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 16669                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 16670                                  ;
 16671                                  ; logic:
 16672                                  ;
 16673                                  ; {
 16674                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 16675                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 16676                                  ;	BootIo;
 16677                                  ;	if (no error) then
 16678                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 16679                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 16680                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 16681                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 16682                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 16683                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 16684                                  ;		};
 16685                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 16686                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 16687                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 16688                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 16689                                  ;		};
 16690                                  ;	else
 16691                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 16692                                  ;
 16693                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16694                                  
 16695                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16696                                  
 16697                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16698                                  SetMediaId:
 16699 00001452 E87000                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 16700 00001455 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 16701                                  					; Logical drive	number
 16702 00001459 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 16703 0000145B C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 16704 00001460 52                      		push	dx
 16705 00001461 E84900                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 16706 00001464 5A                      		pop	dx
 16707 00001465 72EA                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 16708                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 16709 00001467 803E[6701]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 16710                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 16711 0000146C 72E1                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 16712                                  
 16713                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16714                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 16715                                  		;			; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 16716                                  		;jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 16717                                  		
 16718 0000146E 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 16719 0000146F 57                      		push	di
 16720 00001470 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 16721 00001471 07                      		pop	es
 16722                                  
 16723                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16724                                  		;;;
 16725                                  		;mov	di, disksector+43h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 16726 00001472 BF[9401]                		mov	di, disksector+42h ; BS_FAT32_BootSig ; 24/12/2023 
 16727 00001475 833E[6801]00            		cmp	word [disksector+16h], 0 ; BPB.FATSz16
 16728 0000147A 7403                    		jz      short IOCtl_If5	; FAT32 fs
 16729 0000147C 83EF1C                  		sub	di, 1Ch		; 67-28 ; offset disksektor+27h
 16730                                  		; di = disksector+26h = BS_BootSig ; 24/12/2023
 16731                                  IOCtl_If5:

 16733 0000147F 803D29                  		cmp	byte [di], 29h
 16734 00001482 7404                    		je	short IOCtl_If8
 16735 00001484 5F                      		pop	di		; not extended boot record
 16736 00001485 07                      		pop	es
 16737                                  		;jmp	short IOCtl_If7
 16738                                  		; 24/12/2023

 16740                                  IOCtl_If8:

 16774                                  ;IOCtl_If7:

 16780                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16781                                  
 16782                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16783                                  
 16784                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16785                                  ;	BootIo
 16786                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16787                                  ;
 16788                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 16789                                  ;
 16790                                  ; input :
 16791                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 16792                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 16793                                  ;
 16794                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 16795                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 16796                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 16797                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 16798                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 16799                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 16800                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 16801                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 16802                                  ;
 16803                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 16804                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 16805                                  ;
 16806                                  ; logic:
 16807                                  ;
 16808                                  ; {
 16809                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 16810                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 16811                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 16812                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 16813                                  ; }
 16814                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16815                                  
 16816                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16817                                  BootIo:	
 16818 000014AD 06                      		push	es
 16819 000014AE 57                      		push	di
 16820 000014AF 53                      		push	bx
 16821 000014B0 1E                      		push	ds
 16822 000014B1 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 16823                                  
 16824                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 16825                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 16826                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 16827                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 16828                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 16829                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 16830                                  
 16831 000014B2 BF[5201]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 16832 000014B5 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 16833 000014B7 8916[9C04]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 16834 000014BB B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 16835 000014BE E850F5                  		call	diskio
 16836 000014C1 5B                      		pop	bx
 16837 000014C2 5F                      		pop	di
 16838 000014C3 07                      		pop	es
 16839 000014C4 C3                      		retn
 16840                                  
 16841                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16842                                  
 16843                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16844                                  
 16845                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16846                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 16847                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16848                                  ;
 16849                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 16850                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 16851                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 16852                                  ; history in the flags.
 16853                                  ;
 16854                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 16855                                  ;
 16856                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 16857                                  ;
 16858                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 16859                                  ;
 16860                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 16861                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 16862                                  ;
 16863                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16864                                  
 16865                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16866                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 16867 000014C5 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 16868 000014C9 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 16869 000014CB 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 16870                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16871 000014CD 26F6453F04              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags] ; PCDOS 7.1
 16872                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16873                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 16874                                  		;;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16875                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 16876 000014D2 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 16877 000014D4 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1   ; This rom support change line?
 16878 000014D9 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 16879 000014DB E8AD07                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 16880 000014DE 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 16881                                  
 16882                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 16883

 16886                                  				; DL = drive to	check
 16887                                  				; Return: AH = disk change status

 16889 000014E6 53                      		push	bx

 16891                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this

 16902                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16903                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 16904                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16905                                  ;
 16906                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 16907                                  ;
 16908                                  ; INPUT :
 16909                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 16910                                  ;
 16911                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 16912                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 16913                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16914                                  
 16915                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16916                                  
 16917                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16918                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 16919 000014EF C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 16920 000014F3 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 16921                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 16922                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16923 000014F6 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 16924                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16925 000014F8 26F6454002              		test	byte [es:di+40h], 02h ; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 16926                                  		;test	word ptr es:[di+3Fh], 200h
 16927                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16928                                  		;test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 16929                                  		;;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16930                                  					; unformatted_media
 16931 000014FD 7501                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 16932                                  		;inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 16933                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16934 000014FF 40                      		inc	ax
 16935                                  GafDone:				
 16936 00001500 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 16937 00001503 C3                      		retn
 16938                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16939                                  
 16940                                  ; 16/10/2022

 16942                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16943                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 16944                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16945                                  ;
 16946                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 16947                                  ;
 16948                                  ; input :
 16949                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 16950                                  ;
 16951                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 16952                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16953                                  
 16954                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16955                                  
 16956                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16957                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 16958 00001504 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 16959 00001508 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 16960                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16961 0000150B 26806540FD              		and	byte [es:di+40h], 0FDh ; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 16962                                  		;and	word ptr es:[di+3Fh], 0FDFFh
 16963                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16964                                  		;and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 16965                                  		;;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16966                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 16967 00001510 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 16968 00001514 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 16969                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16970 00001516 26804D4002              		or	byte [es:di+40h], 02h ; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 16971                                  		;or	word ptr es:[di+3Fh], 200h
 16972                                  		; 15/04/2024
 16973                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16974                                  		;or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 16975                                  		;;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16976                                  					; unformatted_media
 16977                                  saf_Done:				
 16978 0000151B C3                      		retn

 16983                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16984                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 16985                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16986                                  ;
 16987                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 16988                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 16989                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 16990                                  ;
 16991                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16992                                  
 16993                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16994                                  
 16995                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16996                                  ioctl_support_query:
 16997 0000151C 06                      		push	es
 16998 0000151D C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 16999 00001521 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 17000                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 17001                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17002                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 17003 00001525 3C48                    		cmp	al, 48h		; IOC_NEW_DC (PCDOS 7.1)
 17004                                  					; new generic ioctl function (FAT32)
 17005 00001527 7404                    		je	short ioctl_support
 17006                                  
 17007 00001529 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 17008                                  					; See if major code is 8
 17009 0000152B 7513                    		jne	short nosupport
 17010                                  ioctl_support:
 17011 0000152D 0E                      		push	cs
 17012 0000152E 07                      		pop	es
 17013                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17014                                  		; 02/09/2023
 17015 0000152F B90E00                  		mov	cx, 14          ; (PCDOS 7.1) IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 17016                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 17017                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17018 00001532 BF[BD0E]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 17019                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 17020                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 17021 00001535 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 17022 00001537 F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 17023 00001539 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 17024 0000153B B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 17025                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17026                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 17027                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 17028                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 17029                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 17030                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17031                                  ioctlsupexit:
 17032 0000153E 07                      		pop	es
 17033                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17034                                  		; cf = 0
 17035                                  		;clc
 17036 0000153F C3                      		retn
 17037                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17038                                  nosupport:
 17039 00001540 07                      		pop	es
 17040 00001541 E991EB                  		jmp	bc_cmderr

 17043                                  ; 16/10/2022
 17044                                  
 17045                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17046                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 17047                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17048                                  ;
 17049                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 17050                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 17051                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 17052                                  ;	    drive)
 17053                                  ;
 17054                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 17055                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 17056                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 17057                                  ;
 17058                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 17059                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 17060                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 17061                                  ;
 17062                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 17063                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 17064                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 17065                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 17066                                  ;
 17067                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 17068                                  ;
 17069                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 17070                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 17071                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 17072                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 17073                                  ; 
 17074                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17075                                  
 17076                                  		; 19/10/2022
 17077                                  SenseMediaType:
 17078 00001544 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 17079 00001548 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 17080                                  		; 10/10/2022
 17081                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 17082 0000154B 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 17083 0000154D 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 17084                                  		;
 17085 0000154F 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 17086                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 17087                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17088                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 17089 00001553 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 17090                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 17091 00001555 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 17092 00001557 7216                    		jc	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 17093 00001559 FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 17094                                  DetermineMediaType:
 17095 0000155B FEC8                    		dec	al
 17096 0000155D 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 17097 0000155F 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 17098 00001561 0404                    		add	al, 4
 17099 00001563 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 17100 00001565 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 17101 00001567 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 17102 00001569 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 17103                                  GotMediaType:
 17104 0000156B 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 17105                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17106                                  		; cf = 0
 17107                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 17108 0000156E C3                      		retn
 17109                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17110                                  
 17111                                  MediaSenseEr:
 17112 0000156F 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 17113 00001572 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 17114 00001574 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 17115 00001576 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 17116 00001579 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 17117                                  UnknownMediaType:
 17118 0000157B B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 17119                                  SenseErrExit:
 17120 0000157D B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 17121 0000157F F9                      		stc
 17122 00001580 C3                      		retn
 17123                                  
 17124                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17125                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17126                                  		;db    0
 17127                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17128                                  
 17129                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17130                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:15F2h
 17131                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17132                                  ; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1)
 17133

 17135                                  
 17136                                  SetLockState:
 17137 00001581 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; set media lock state
 17138 00001585 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+13h]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 17139                                  		;mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 17140                                  		;call	check_int13h_exts_present
 17141                                  		; 26/12/2023
 17142 00001588 E82100                  		call	check_int13h_exts_p
 17143                                  		;mov	al, 3		; unknown command error
 17144 0000158B 721C                    		jc	short setlockst_ret
 17145 0000158D 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; [bx+A_LOCKSTATE_CONTROL.LOCKSTATE_FUNCTIONS]
 17146 0000158F B445                    		mov	ah, 45h
 17147 00001591 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - IBM/MS Extension - LOCK/UNLOCK DRIVE
 17148                                  		; (DL - drive, [SI - disk address packet)
 17149 00001593 884701                  		mov	[bx+1], al	; 1 = locked, 0 = not locked
 17150                                  		; [bx+A_LOCKSTATE_CONTROL.LOCKSTATE_FLAG]
 17151                                  		
 17152                                  		; 26/12/2023
 17153 00001596 EB0A                    		jmp	short sls_em
 17154                                  
 17155                                  ;		jnc	short setlockst_ret
 17156                                  ;		mov	al, ah
 17157                                  ;		call	maperror
 17158                                  ;setlockst_ret:
 17159                                  ;		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in case of carry
 17160                                  ;		retn
 17161                                  
 17162                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 17163                                  
 17164                                  EjectMedia:
 17165                                  		;mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; eject media in drive
 17166                                  		;			; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 17167                                  		;call	check_int13h_exts_present
 17168                                  		; 26/12/2023
 17169 00001598 E81100                  		call	check_int13h_exts_p
 17170                                  		;mov	al, 3		; unknown command error
 17171 0000159B 720C                    		jc	short ejectm_ret
 17172 0000159D B80046                  		mov	ax, 4600h
 17173 000015A0 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - IBM/MS Extension - EJECT MEDIA
 17174                                  		; (DL - drive)
 17175                                  sls_em:			; 26/12/2023
 17176 000015A2 7305                    		jnc	short ejectm_ret
 17177 000015A4 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
 17178 000015A6 E800F8                  		call	maperror
 17179                                  setlockst_ret:		; 26/12/2023
 17180                                  ejectm_ret:
 17181 000015A9 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in case of carry
 17182 000015AB C3                      		retn
 17183                                  
 17184                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 17185                                  
 17186                                  		; 26/12/2023
 17187                                  check_int13h_exts_p:
 17188 000015AC 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 17189                                  
 17190                                  check_int13h_exts_present:
 17191 000015B0 B441                    		mov	ah, 41h
 17192 000015B2 53                      		push	bx
 17193 000015B3 BBAA55                  		mov	bx, 55AAh
 17194 000015B6 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - Check for INT 13h Extensions
 17195                                  					; BX = 55AAh, DL = drive number
 17196                                  					; Return: CF set if not supported
 17197                                  					; AH = extensions version
 17198                                  					; BX = AA55h
 17199                                  					; CX = Interface support bit map
 17200 000015B8 81FB55AA                		cmp	bx, 0AA55h
 17201 000015BC 5B                      		pop	bx
 17202 000015BD 7505                    		jnz	short exts_notsupported
 17203 000015BF F6C102                  		test	cl, 2		; bit 1 - drive locking and ejecting subset
 17204 000015C2 7503                    		jnz	short exts_supported
 17205                                  exts_notsupported:
 17206                                  		; 26/12/2023
 17207 000015C4 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 17208                                  		;
 17209 000015C6 F9                      		stc
 17210                                  exts_supported:
 17211 000015C7 C3                      		retn
 17212                                  
 17213                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 17214                                  
 17215                                  GetDrvMapInfo:
 17216 000015C8 8CD9                    		mov	cx, ds		; get drive map information
 17217                                  					;
 17218                                  					; es:di points to BDS which belongs to
 17219                                  					;	  the requested logical/dos drive number
 17220                                  					;
 17221                                  					; Format of parameter block:
 17222                                  					; Offset  Description (Table 01570)
 17223                                  					;  00h    (call) length of this buffer (in bytes)
 17224                                  					;  01h    (ret) number of bytes in parameter block
 17225                                  					;	    actually used
 17226                                  					;  02h    (ret) drive flags
 17227                                  					;  03h    (ret) physical drive number
 17228                                  					;	    00h-7Fh floppy
 17229                                  					;	    80h-FEh hard
 17230                                  					;	    FFh no physical drive
 17231                                  					;  04h    (ret) bitmap of logical drives associated with
 17232                                  					;	    physical drive
 17233                                  					;	    bit 0 = drive A:, etc.
 17234                                  					;  08h    (ret) relative block address of partition start
 17235                                  					;	    qword
 17236                                  					;
 17237                                  					; Ref: Ralf Brown's Interrupt List, INTERRUP.G
 17238 000015CA C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 17239 000015CE C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+13h]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 17240 000015D1 B80381                  		mov	ax, 8103h	; ah = generic ioctl error code (81h)
 17241                                  					; al = unknown command error (03h)
 17242 000015D4 803F10                  		cmp	byte [bx], 10h	; parameter buffer length = 16 bytes
 17243 000015D7 7251                    		jb	short gdmi_4
 17244 000015D9 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 17245 000015DD 885703                  		mov	[bx+3], dl	; parameter block - offset 3 - physical drive number
 17246 000015E0 C6470110                		mov	byte [bx+1], 10h ; parameter block - actually used length
 17247 000015E4 268B4517                		mov	ax, [es:di+17h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensectors]
 17248 000015E8 894708                  		mov	[bx+8], ax	; parameter block - offset 8 - partition start LBA
 17249 000015EB 268B4519                		mov	ax, [es:di+19h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensectors+2]
 17250 000015EF 89470A                  		mov	[bx+0Ah], ax	; parameter block - offset 10
 17251 000015F2 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax ; 0
 17252 000015F4 884702                  		mov	[bx+2], al	; drive flags = 0 (protected mode flags etc.)
 17253 000015F7 89470C                  		mov	[bx+0Ch], ax	; high dword of partition start address (LBA) is 0
 17254 000015FA 89470E                  		mov	[bx+0Eh], ax
 17255 000015FD 894704                  		mov	[bx+4], ax	; logical drive bitmap of same physical drive
 17256                                  					; initialized as 0
 17257 00001600 894706                  		mov	[bx+6], ax ; 0
 17258 00001603 8EC1                    		mov	es, cx
 17259                                  		;les	di, dword ptr es:start_bds ; 1st BDS
 17260 00001605 26C43E[1901]            		les	di, [es:start_bds]
 17261 0000160A B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; bit 0 (drive A:)
 17262                                  gdmi_1:
 17263 0000160D 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; last BDS ?
 17264 00001610 7415                    		jz	short gdmi_3	; yes
 17265 00001612 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum], dl
 17266                                  					; is it same physical drive ?
 17267 00001616 7506                    		jnz	short gdmi_2	; no
 17268 00001618 094F04                  		or	[bx+4], cx	; set bit for logical drive index of this BDS
 17269                                  					; (previously) shifted bit (which is 1/ON) is in ax:cx
 17270 0000161B 094706                  		or	[bx+6], ax
 17271                                  gdmi_2:
 17272 0000161E D1E1                    		shl	cx, 1		; shift one left for setting the next drive's bit
 17273 00001620 D1D0                    		rcl	ax, 1		; set high word of the bit select (set) value
 17274 00001622 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; next BDS
 17275 00001625 EBE6                    		jmp	short gdmi_1	; loop until di = -1 (last BDS sign)
 17276                                  gdmi_3:
 17277 00001627 B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h	; success
 17278                                  gdmi_4:
 17279 0000162A C3                      		retn
 17280                                  
 17281                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17282                                  
 17283                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 17284                                  ; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 17285                                  
 17286                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17287                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 17288                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17289                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 17290                                  
 17291                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 17292                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 17293                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 17294                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 17295                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 17296                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 17297                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 17298                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 17299                                  ;
 17300                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 17301                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 17302                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 17303                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 17304                                  ;
 17305                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 17306                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 17307                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 17308                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 17309                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 17310                                  ;
 17311                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 17312                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 17313                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 17314                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 17315                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 17316                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 17317                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 17318                                  
 17319                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 17320                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022
 17321                                  
 17322                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 17323                                  ;BIOSCODE:16AAh (PCDOS 7.1, IBMBIO.COM) ; 26/12/2023
 17324                                  
 17325                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h

 17328 00001630 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 17329 00001633 7432                    		jz	short mine

 17463                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 17464                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 17465                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.

 17467                                  win386call:
 17468 000016A7 1E                      		push	ds
 17469 000016A8 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 17470                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 17471                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h

 17473                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?

 17475 000016B1 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 17476                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 17477 000016B3 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 17478                                  		; 12/12/2022

 17480                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it	win386 or win286 dos extender?
 17481 000016B8 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue

 17483 000016BA 8026[1208]00            		and	byte [IsWin386], 0

 17495                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next+2, es

 17501 000016D7 07                      		pop	es

 17510                                  handle_multmult:
 17511 000016DA 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1
 17512 000016DC 7514                    		jnz	short try_2
 17513 000016DE 1E                      		push	ds
 17514 000016DF E84500                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 17515                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17516                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 17517                                  		;dec	bx
 17518 000016E2 BBFFFF                  		mov	bx, 0FFFFh
 17519 000016E5 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA
 17520 000016E7 89FB                    		mov	bx, di
 17521 000016E9 F7D3                    		not	bx
 17522 000016EB 09DB                    		or	bx, bx
 17523 000016ED 7401                    		jz	short try_1
 17524 000016EF 43                      		inc	bx
 17525                                  try_1:

 17529 000016F1 CF                      		iret

 17531                                  
 17532                                  try_2:
 17533 000016F2 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; multMULTALLOCHMA
 17534 000016F4 7530                    		jnz	short try_3
 17535 000016F6 1E                      		push	ds
 17536                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17537                                  		;xor	di, di
 17538                                  		;dec	di
 17539 000016F7 BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh	; assume not enough space
 17540 000016FA 8EC7                    		mov	es, di

 17542 000016FF 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 17543 00001702 7421                    		jz	short InsuffHMA

 17545 00001706 39FB                    		cmp	bx, di
 17546 00001708 7605                    		jbe	short try_4
 17547                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17548                                  		;sub	di, di
 17549                                  		;dec	di

 17551                                  		;jmp	short InsuffHMA
 17552                                  		; 02/09/2023
