 18627                                  		; 17/10/2022
 18628 00001ABF 2E8816[F91A]            		mov	[cs:DRVLET], dl	; "A: and press any key when ready\r\n\n"
 18629                                  		; 16/10/2022
 18630                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:drvlet], dl
 18631                                  		;mov	byte ptr cs:17E4h, dl ; [cs:drvlet]
 18632                                  					; 0070h:3D54h =	2C7h:17E4h
 18633 00001AC4 BE[DD1A]                		mov	si, SNGMSG	; "\r\nInsert diskette for drive "
 18634                                  		;mov	si, 17C8h	; sngmsg
 18635                                  					; 0070h:3D38h =	2C7h:17C8h
 18636 00001AC7 53                      		push	bx
 18637 00001AC8 2E                      		cs
 18638 00001AC9 AC                      		lodsb			; get the next character of the message
 18639                                  		;lods	byte ptr cs:[si]
 18640                                  wrmsg_loop:
 18641 00001ACA CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
 18642                                  					; AL = character to display
 18643 00001ACC 2E                      		cs
 18644 00001ACD AC                      		lodsb
 18645                                  		;lods	byte ptr cs:[si] ; cs lodsb
 18646                                  					; get the next character of the	message
 18647 00001ACE 08C0                    		or	al, al
 18648 00001AD0 75F8                    		jnz	short wrmsg_loop
 18649 00001AD2 E833E7                  		call	con_flush	; flush out keyboard queue
 18650                                  					; call rom-bios
 18651 00001AD5 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 18652 00001AD7 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
 18653                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
 18654 00001AD9 5B                      		pop	bx
 18655                                  swpdsk9:
 18656 00001ADA 5A                      		pop	dx
 18657 00001ADB 59                      		pop	cx
 18658 00001ADC C3                      		retn
 18659                                  
 18660                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18661                                  
 18662                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 18663                                  
 18664                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 18665                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 18666                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 18667                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 18668                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 18669                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 18670                                  ; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18671                                  
 18672                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 18673                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1B67h
 18674 00001ADD 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 18675 00001ADF 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 18675 00001AE8 736B6574746520666F-
 18675 00001AF1 7220647269766520   
 18676                                  
 18677                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 18678                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1B83h
 18679 00001AF9 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 18679 00001B02 65737320616E79206B-
 18679 00001B0B 6579207768656E2072-
 18679 00001B14 656164790D0A       
 18680 00001B1A 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 18681                                  
 18682                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 18683                                  
 18684                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18685                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 18686                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 18687                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 18688                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18689                                  
 18690                                  		; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18691                                  chkopcnt:	
 18692 00001B1C 26837D3C00              		cmp     word [es:di+3Ch], 0
 18693                                  		;cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 18694 00001B21 C3                      		retn
 18695                                  
 18696                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 18697                                  
 18698                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18699                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 18700                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 18701                                  ;
 18702                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 18703                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18704                                  
 18705                                  		; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18706                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1BA6h
 18707                                  mediacheck:
 18708 00001B22 E852EE                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 18709 00001B25 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 18710 00001B27 E86101                  		call	haschange
 18711 00001B2A 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 18712                                  		; 26/12/2023
 18713                                  		;test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 18714 00001B2C E85001                  		call	checkromchange
 18715 00001B2F 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 18716 00001B31 50                      		push	ax
 18717 00001B32 52                      		push	dx
 18718 00001B33 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 18719                                  					; set logical drive number
 18720 00001B37 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 18721 00001B39 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 18722                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 18723                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 18724 00001B3B 5A                      		pop	dx
 18725 00001B3C 58                      		pop	ax
 18726 00001B3D 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 18727 00001B3F BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 18728                                  
 18729                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 18730                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 18731                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 18732                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 18733                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 18734                                  ; status.
 18735                                  		; 19/10/2022
 18736 00001B42 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 18737 00001B46 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 18738                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 18739                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 18740                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 18741                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 18742 00001B4A 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 18743                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 18744                                  
 18745                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 18746                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 18747                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 18748                                  
 18749 00001B4C 50                      		push	ax
 18750 00001B4D 51                      		push	cx
 18751 00001B4E 52                      		push	dx
 18752 00001B4F E8D8EA                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 18753 00001B52 5A                      		pop	dx
 18754 00001B53 59                      		pop	cx
 18755 00001B54 58                      		pop	ax
 18756 00001B55 09F6                    		or	si, si
 18757 00001B57 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 18758                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 18759 00001B59 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 18760                                  mediaret:
 18761 00001B5B C3                      		retn
 18762                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18763                                  
 18764                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 18765                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 18766                                  ; or write.
 18767                                  
 18768                                  mediadovolid:
 18769 00001B5C E877EB                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 18770 00001B5F 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 18771 00001B61 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 18772 00001B64 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 18773 00001B66 E940F2                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 18774                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18775                                  
 18776                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 18777                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 18778                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 18779                                  ; dos.
 18780                                  ;
 18781                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 18782                                  
 18783                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 18784                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 18785                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 18786                                  
 18787                                  checklatchio:
 18788                                  
 18789                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 18790                                  
 18791                                  		; 26/12/2023
 18792                                  		;cmp	word [es:di+3Ch], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]	
 18793 00001B69 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 18794 00001B6C 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 18795                                  
 18796                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 18797                                  
 18798                                  		; 26/12/2023
 18799                                  		;test	word [es:di+3Fh], 40h
 18800                                  		;			; test [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 18801 00001B6E E80E01                  		call	checkromchange
 18802 00001B71 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 18803                                  
 18804                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 18805                                  ; expensive verification.
 18806                                  
 18807 00001B73 E860EB                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 18808 00001B76 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 18809 00001B78 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 18810 00001B7B 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 18811 00001B7D 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 18812 00001B7F 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 18813 00001B81 E88F00                  		call	returnvid
 18814                                  checklatchret:
 18815 00001B84 E822F2                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 18816                                  ret_no_error_map:
 18817 00001B87 F9                      		stc
 18818 00001B88 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 18819                                  checkret:
 18820 00001B89 C3                      		retn
 18821                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18822                                  
 18823                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 18824                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 18825                                  ;
 18826                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 18827                                  
 18828                                  checkfatvid:
 18829 00001B8A E8D101                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 18830 00001B8D 09F6                    		or	si, si
 18831 00001B8F 7835                    		js	short changed_drv
 18832                                  
 18833                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 18834                                  
 18835                                  		; fall into check_vid
 18836                                  
 18837                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 18838                                  
 18839                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 18840                                  ;
 18841                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 18842                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 18843                                  ;
 18844                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 18845                                  ;
 18846                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 18847                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 18848                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 18849                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 18850                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 18851                                  ;
 18852                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 18853                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 18854                                  ; routine.)
 18855                                  ;
 18856                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 18857                                  
 18858                                  		; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18859                                  		; 19/10/2022
 18860                                  check_vid:
 18861                                  
 18862                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 18863                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 18864                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 18865                                  
 18866                                  		; 26/12/2023
 18867                                  		;;;
 18868 00001B91 833E[6801]00            		cmp	word [disksector+16h], 0 ; BPB_FATSz16
 18869 00001B96 7507                    		jnz     short chk_vid_1
 18870 00001B98 803E[9401]29            		cmp     byte [disksector+42h], 29h ; BS_FAT32_BootSig
 18871                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 18872 00001B9D EB05                    		jmp     short chk_vid_2
 18873                                  chk_vid_1:
 18874                                  		;;;
 18875 00001B9F 803E[7801]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 18876                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 18877                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 18878                                  chk_vid_2:		; 26/12/2023
 18879 00001BA4 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 18880 00001BA6 E8E200                  		call	haschange
 18881 00001BA9 74DE                    		jz	short checkret
 18882 00001BAB 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 18883 00001BAD 803E[6201]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 ; BPB_NumFATs
 18884                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 18885 00001BB2 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 18886                                  					; if not fat system
 18887 00001BB4 E8F400                  		call	read_volume_id
 18888 00001BB7 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 18889 00001BB9 E89901                  		call	check_volume_id
 18890 00001BBC BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 18891                                  					; definitely changed
 18892 00001BBF 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 18893                                  
 18894 00001BC1 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 18895                                  vid_no_changed:
 18896 00001BC2 E8C000                  		call	resetchanged
 18897                                  		; 12/12/2022
 18898                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 18899                                  		;clc
 18900                                  checkfatret:
 18901 00001BC5 C3                      		retn
 18902                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18903                                  
 18904                                  		; 12/12/2022
 18905                                  changed_drv:
 18906 00001BC6 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 18907 00001BC7 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 18908                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 18909 00001BCC C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 18910                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18911                                  
 18912                                  ; extended id check
 18913                                  
 18914                                  ; 16/10/2022
 18915                                  
 18916                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 18917                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 18918                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 18919                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 18920                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 18921                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 18922                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 18923                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 18924                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 18925                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 18926                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 18927                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 18928                                  ;
 18929                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 18930                                  
 18931                                  		; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18932                                  		; 19/10/2022
 18933                                  do_ext_check_id:
 18934                                  		; 26/12/2023
 18935                                  		;push	ax
 18936                                  		;;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 18937                                  		;			; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 18938                                  		;mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 18939                                  ; 26/12/2023
 18940                                  %if 1
 18941                                  		;;;
 18942 00001BCD 57                      		push	di
 18943 00001BCE BE[9501]                		mov	si, disksector+43h ; BS_FAT32_VolID
 18944                                  					; [DiskSector+FAT32_EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 18945 00001BD1 833E[6801]00            		cmp	word [disksector+16h], 0 ; BPB_FATSz16
 18946 00001BD6 7403                    		jz	short chk_vid_3
 18947 00001BD8 83EE1C                  		sub	si, 28		; BS_VolID
 18948                                  		; si = disksector+27h	; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 18949                                  chk_vid_3:
 18950                                  		; [es:di+89h] = [es:di+BDS.vol_serial]
 18951 00001BDB 81C78900                		add	di, 137		; BDS.vol_serial
 18952 00001BDF A7                      		cmpsw	; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL] ; (or FAT32_EXT_BOOT)
 18953                                  			;		= [di+BDS.vol_serial] ?
 18954 00001BE0 7501                    		jnz	short chk_vid_4
 18955 00001BE2 A7                      		cmpsw	; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2] ; (or FAT32_EXT_BOOT)
 18956                                  			;		= [di+BDS.vol_serial+2] ?
 18957                                  chk_vid_4:
 18958 00001BE3 5F                      		pop	di
 18959                                  		;pop	ax
 18960 00001BE4 7504                    		jnz	short ext_changed ; not equal/same
 18961 00001BE6 31F6                    		xor	si, si 		 ; 0 ; don't know
 18962 00001BE8 EBD8                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed ; reset the flag
 18963                                  		;;;
 18964                                  %else
 18965                                  		; 02/09/2023
 18966                                  		xor	si, si ; 0
 18967                                  		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 18968                                  		jnz	short ext_changed
 18969                                  		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 18970                                  		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 18971                                  		jnz	short ext_changed
 18972                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 18973                                  					; don't know
 18974                                  		pop	ax
 18975                                  		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 18976                                  					; reset the flag
 18977                                  %endif
 18978                                  
 18979                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18980                                  
 18981                                  ext_changed:
 18982                                  		; 26/12/2023
 18983                                  		;pop	ax
 18984                                  		; 02/09/2023
 18985                                  		;dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 18986 00001BEA BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 18987                                  					; disk changed!
 18988                                  		; 12/12/2022
 18989                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 18990                                  		;clc
 18991 00001BED EBD7                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 18992                                  
 18993                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18994                                  
 18995                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 18996                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 18997                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 18998                                  ;
 18999                                  ; es:di -> bds
 19000                                  
 19001                                  checkio:				
 19002 00001BEF 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 19003 00001BF2 75D1                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 19004 00001BF4 E825FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 19005 00001BF7 74CC                    		jz	short checkfatret
 19006 00001BF9 E8DAEA                  		call	GetBp
 19007 00001BFC 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 19008 00001BFE E889FF                  		call	checkfatvid
 19009 00001C01 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 19010 00001C03 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 19011 00001C05 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 19012 00001C07 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 19013 00001C08 C3                      		retn
 19014                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19015                                  
 19016                                  checkioerr:				
 19017 00001C09 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 19018                                  
 19019                                  checkioret:				
 19020 00001C0C F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 19021 00001C0D E955F1                  		jmp	harderr
 19022                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19023                                  
 19024                                  no_error_map:				
 19025 00001C10 E955F1                  		jmp	harderr2
 19026                                  
 19027                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 19028                                  
 19029                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 19030                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 19031                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 19032                                  
 19033                                  returnvid:		
 19034 00001C13 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 19035                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 19036 00001C16 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 19037 00001C19 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 19038 00001C1B F9                      		stc
 19039 00001C1C C3                      		retn
 19040                                  
 19041                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19042                                  
 19043                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 19044                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 19045                                  ;
 19046                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 19047                                  ; **trashes si**
 19048                                  
 19049                                  media_set_vid:				
 19050 00001C1D BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 19051                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 19052                                  
 19053                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 19054                                  
 19055                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 19056                                  
 19057                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 19058                                  
 19059                                  		; 14/04/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 19060                                  		; 19/10/2022
 19061                                  vid_into_packet:
 19062 00001C20 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 19063 00001C21 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 19064                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 19065                                  		; 14/04/2024
 19066 00001C25 83C77D                  		add	di, 125	; (PCDOS 7.1)
 19067 00001C28 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 19068                                  		;sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 19069 00001C2A 83EF7D                  		sub	di, 125
 19070 00001C2D 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 19071 00001C30 1F                      		pop	ds
 19072                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 19073 00001C31 C3                      		retn
 19074                                  
 19075                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19076                                  
 19077                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19078                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 19079                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 19080                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 19081                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 19082                                  ;
 19083                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 19084                                  ;		ah has media byte
 19085                                  ;
 19086                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 19087                                  ;		    no registers modified
 19088                                  ;		carry set
 19089                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 19090                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 19091                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 19092                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 19093                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 19094                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 19095                                  ;
 19096                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19097                                  
 19098                                  		; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19099                                  hidensity:
 19100                                  
 19101                                  ; check for correct drive
 19102                                  		
 19103                                  		; 26/12/2023
 19104 00001C32 26F6453F02              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 2 ; is it special?
 19105                                  		; 12/12/2022
 19106                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 2
 19107                                  		;;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?
 19108                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 19109 00001C37 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 19110                                  
 19111                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 19112                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 19113                                  
 19114                                  		; 26/12/2023
 19115 00001C39 26807D3E02              		cmp	byte [es:di+3Eh], 2 ; is it single-media?
 19116                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 19117 00001C3E 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 19118                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 19119                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 19120 00001C40 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 19121 00001C43 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 19122                                  
 19123                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 19124                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 19125                                  
 19126                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 19127                                  		; 26/12/2023
 19128 00001C45 268A453E                		mov	al, [es:di+3Eh] ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 19129                                  		;mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 19130 00001C49 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 19131                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 19132                                  					; ffOther

 19134 00001C4D 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 19135                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 19136                                  					; ff288
 19137 00001C4F 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 19138 00001C51 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 19139 00001C53 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 19140                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 19141                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 19142 00001C56 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 19143                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 19144                                  					; 2 sides
 19145                                  		; 02/09/2023
 19146 00001C59 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 19147 00001C5A BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 19148                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 19149                                  					; & head max
 19150                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 19151 00001C5D E9EAEA                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp

 19155                                  		; 02/09/2023
 19156 00001C60 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address
 19157                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 19158 00001C61 E9A9EA                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code

 19162                                  ;dofloppy:
 19163                                  		;retn

 19165                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 19166                                  
 19167                                  ; 16/10/2022
 19168                                  
 19169                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19170                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 19171                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 19172                                  ;
 19173                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 19174                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 19175                                  ;   outputs:	none
 19176                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 19177                                  ;
 19178                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 19179                                  ;
 19180                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 19181                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19182                                  
 19183                                  		; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19184                                  set_changed_dl:	
 19185 00001C64 06                      		push	es
 19186 00001C65 57                      		push	di
 19187                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 19188                                  		; 19/10/2022
 19189 00001C66 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 19190                                  
 19191                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 19192                                  
 19193                                  scan_bds:
 19194 00001C6A 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 19195 00001C6E 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 19196                                  
 19197                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 19198                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 19199                                  
 19200                                  		; 26/12/2023
 19201 00001C70 26095D3F                		or	[es:di+3Fh], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 19202                                  		;or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 19203                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 19204                                  get_next_bds:
 19205 00001C74 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 19206                                  					; go to	next bds
 19207 00001C77 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 19208 00001C7A 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 19209 00001C7C 5F                      		pop	di
 19210 00001C7D 07                      		pop	es
 19211 00001C7E C3                      		retn
 19212

 19216                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 19217                                  ;
 19218                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 19219                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 19220                                  ;		zero reset - change
 19221                                  ;   registers modified: none
 19222                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19223                                  
 19224                                  		; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19225                                  checkromchange:

 19230                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 19231                                  		;;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 19232                                  					; fchanged
 19233 00001C84 C3                      		retn
 19234

 19254 00001C8A C3                      		retn

 19278                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19279                                  
 19280                                  ; 16/10/2022
 19281                                  
 19282                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19283                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 19284                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 19285                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 19286                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 19287                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 19288                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19289                                  
 19290                                  ; set_volume_id
 19291                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 19292                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 19293                                  ;
 19294                                  ;   on entry:
 19295                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 19296                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 19297                                  ;
 19298                                  ;   on exit:
 19299                                  ;	carry clear:
 19300                                  ;	   successful call
 19301                                  ;	carry set
 19302                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 19303                                  
 19304                                  set_volume_id:
 19305 00001C91 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 19306 00001C92 50                      		push	ax
 19307 00001C93 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 19308 00001C96 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 19309 00001C98 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 19310 00001C9B 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 19311 00001C9D E8A900                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 19312 00001CA0 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 19313                                  setvret:				
 19314                                  		; 10/12/2022
 19315                                  		; cf = 0
 19316                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 19317 00001CA3 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 19318 00001CA4 5A                      		pop	dx
 19319 00001CA5 C3                      		retn
 19320                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19321                                  
 19322                                  seterr:
 19323 00001CA6 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 19324 00001CA7 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 19325 00001CA8 C3                      		retn
 19326                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19327 00001CA9 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 19328                                  
 19329                                  ; 16/10/2022
 19330                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 19331                                  ; 09/12/2022
 19332                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 19333                                  
 19334                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 19335                                  
 19336                                  ; 16/10/2022
 19337                                  
 19338                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 19339                                  ;
 19340                                  ;   on entry:
 19341                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 19342                                  ;
 19343                                  ;   on exit:
 19344                                  ;	carry clear
 19345                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 19346                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 19347                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 19348                                  ;
 19349                                  ;	carry set:
 19350                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 19351                                  
 19352                                  read_volume_id:
 19353 00001CAB 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 19354 00001CAC 51                      		push	cx
 19355 00001CAD 53                      		push	bx
 19356 00001CAE 50                      		push	ax
 19357 00001CAF 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 19358 00001CB0 57                      		push	di
 19359 00001CB1 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 19360 00001CB2 07                      		pop	es
 19361 00001CB3 BF[4008]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 19362 00001CB6 BE[6305]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 19363                                  		; 26/12/2023
 19364 00001CB9 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 19365                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 19366                                  		
 19367                                  		;rep	movsb
 19368                                  		; 26/12/2023
 19369                                  		;rep movs byte ptr es:[di], byte ptr cs:[si]
 19370                                  		;db 0FBh,2Eh,0A4h 
 19371                                  		;cs	; nul_vid is in BIOSCODE segment 
 19372                                  		;rep movsb
 19373 00001CBC F3                      		rep
 19374 00001CBD 2E                      		cs
 19375 00001CBE A4                      		movsb	
 19376                                  		
 19377 00001CBF 5F                      		pop	di
 19378 00001CC0 07                      		pop	es
 19379 00001CC1 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 19380                                  					; # of fats
 19381 00001CC5 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 19382                                  					; sectors / fat
 19383 00001CC9 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 19384 00001CCB 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 19385                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 19386                                  					;
 19387                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 19388                                  		; 17/10/2022
 19389 00001CCF 2EA3[A91C]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 19390                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 19391                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 19392 00001CD3 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 19393                                  					; # root dir entries
 19394 00001CD7 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 19395 00001CD9 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 19396                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 19397                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 19398 00001CDB 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 19399                                  next_sec:
 19400 00001CDC 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 19401 00001CDD 2EA1[A91C]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 19402                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 19403                                  					; get sector #
 19404 00001CE1 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 19405                                  					; sectors / track
 19406 00001CE5 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 19407 00001CE7 F7F1                    		div	cx
 19408                                  
 19409                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 19410                                  
 19411 00001CE9 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 19412                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 19413 00001CEA 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 19414 00001CEC 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 19415 00001CEE 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 19416                                  					; # heads on this disc
 19417 00001CF2 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 19418 00001CF4 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 19419 00001CF6 E8BDEB                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 19420                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 19421 00001CF9 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 19422 00001CFB B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 19423 00001CFE B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 19424                                  fvid_loop:
 19425                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 19426 00001D00 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 19427                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 19428 00001D02 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 19429 00001D04 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 19430 00001D07 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 19431 00001D09 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 19432 00001D0C 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 19433                                  ent_loop:
 19434 00001D0E 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 19435 00001D11 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 19436 00001D13 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 19437 00001D14 2EFF06[A91C]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 19438                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 19439                                  					; next sector
 19440 00001D19 E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 19441                                  notfound:
 19442                                  		; 02/09/2023
 19443                                  		;xor	si, si
 19444 00001D1B EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 19445                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19446                                  
 19447                                  found_vid:
 19448                                  		; 02/09/2023
 19449                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)
 19450 00001D1D 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 19451 00001D1E 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 19452 00001D20 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 19453 00001D21 57                      		push	di
 19454 00001D22 1E                      		push	ds
 19455 00001D23 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 19456 00001D24 BF[4008]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 19457 00001D27 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 19458                                  					; length of string minus nul
 19459 00001D2A F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 19460                                  		;xor	al, al
 19461                                  		; 02/09/2023
 19462 00001D2C 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 19463 00001D2D AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 19464                                  		;;xor	si, si
 19465                                  		; 02/09/2023
 19466                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 19467 00001D2E 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 19468 00001D2F 07                      		pop	es
 19469                                  fvid_ret:
 19470                                  		; 02/09/2023
 19471 00001D30 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 19472                                  				
 19473 00001D32 58                      		pop	ax
 19474                                  		; 10/12/2022
 19475                                  		; cf = 0
 19476                                  		;clc
 19477                                  rvidret:
 19478 00001D33 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 19479 00001D34 59                      		pop	cx
 19480 00001D35 5A                      		pop	dx
 19481 00001D36 C3                      		retn
 19482                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19483                                  
 19484                                  no_vid:
 19485 00001D37 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 19486                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 19487                                  		; 02/09/2023
 19488 00001D38 EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 19489                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19490                                  
 19491                                  readviderr:
 19492 00001D3A 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 19493 00001D3B 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead
 19494 00001D3C EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 19495                                  
 19496                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19497                                  		; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19498                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 19499                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 19500                                  preset_volid_addr:
 19501 00001D3E BE[4008]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 19502                                  		; 26/12/2023

 19504 00001D41 83C77D                  		add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 19505 00001D44 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 19506                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 19507                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 19508                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 19509                                  		;
 19510 00001D47 FC                      		cld
 19511 00001D48 C3                      		retn
 19512

 19548                                  
 19549                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 19550                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 19551                                  ;
 19552                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 19553                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 19554                                  
 19555                                  		; 27/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19556                                  check_volume_id:
 19557 00001D55 57                      		push	di
 19558 00001D56 51                      		push	cx
 19559                                  		
 19560                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 19561                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 19562                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 19563                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 19564                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 19565                                  		;cld
 19566                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 19567 00001D57 E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 19568                                  
 19569 00001D5A F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 19570                                  		
 19571                                  		; 27/12/2023
 19572                                  		;pop	cx
 19573                                  		;pop	di
 19574                                  		;retn
 19575 00001D5C EBF4                    		jmp	short chk_volid_ok
 19576                                  
 19577                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 19578                                  
 19579                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 19580                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 19581                                  ;
 19582                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 19583                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 19584                                  ;
 19585                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 19586                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 19587                                  ;
 19588                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 19589                                  
 19590                                  fat_check:
 19591 00001D5E 50                      		push	ax
 19592 00001D5F 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 19593 00001D61 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 19594 00001D64 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 19595                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 19596 00001D68 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 19597 00001D6A 4E                      		dec	si
 19598                                  okret1:
 19599 00001D6B 58                      		pop	ax
 19600 00001D6C C3                      		retn
 19601                                  
 19602                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19603

 19605                                  		;times 2 db 0
 19606

 19608                                  		;times 7 db 0
 19609

 19611                                  
 19612                                  		; 09/12/2022
 19613                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 19614                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 19615                                  
 19616                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19617                                  
 19618                                  		; 09/12/2022
 19619                                  		;db 0
 19620                                  
 19621                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 19622                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 19623                                  
 19624                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 19625 00001D6D 00<rep 3h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 19626                                  %endif
 19627                                  
 19628                                  ;align 16
 19629                                  
 19630                                  ; 09/12/2022

 19632                                  ; 29/09/2023

 19699                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 19700                                  ; SYSINIT.TXT (27/01/1983)
 19701                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 19702                                  ;    SYSINIT is  a module linked behind the OEM bios.  It takes
 19703                                  ;over  the  system  initialization  after  the  OEM  bios   has
 19704                                  ;performed any  initialization  it  needs  to  do.   Control is
 19705                                  ;transfered with a long jump to the external  variable  SYSINIT
 19706                                  ;
 19707                                  ;
 19708                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared external:
 19709                                  ;
 19710                                  ;   CURRENT_DOS_LOCATION    WORD
 19711                                  ;
 19712                                  ;This word  contains  the  segment  number of the DOS before it
 19713                                  ;is relocated.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 19714                                  ;
 19715                                  ;   FINAL_DOS_LOCATION      WORD
 19716                                  ;
 19717                                  ;This word contains the segment number of the DOS after SYSINIT
 19718                                  ;moves it.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 19719                                  ;
 19720                                  ;   DEVICE_LIST             DWORD
 19721                                  ;
 19722                                  ;This  double  word  pointer  points  to  the  linked  list  of
 19723                                  ;character and block device drivers.  The  OEM  must  set  this
 19724                                  ;value.
 19725                                  ;
 19726                                  ;   MEMORY_SIZE             WORD
 19727                                  ;
 19728                                  ;This word  contains  the  number  of  RAM  paragraphs.  If the
 19729                                  ;bios doesn't set  this  variable  SYSINIT  will  automatically
 19730                                  ;calculate it.   NOTE:  systems with PARITY checked memory must
 19731                                  ;size memory in the BIOS.  SYSINITs method is to  write  memory
 19732                                  ;and read it back until it gets a mismatch.
 19733                                  ;
 19734                                  ;   DEFAULT_DRIVE           BYTE
 19735                                  ;
 19736                                  ;This is  the initial default drive when the system first comes
 19737                                  ;up.  drive a=0, drive b=1,  etc.   If  the  bios  doesn't  set
 19738                                  ;it then drive a is assumed.
 19739                                  ;
 19740                                  ;   BUFFERS                 BYTE
 19741                                  ;
 19742                                  ;This is  the  default  number of buffers for the system.  This
 19743                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 19744                                  ;It is DBed to 2 in SYSINIT it should be greater than 1.
 19745                                  ;
 19746                                  ;   FILES                   BYTE
 19747                                  ;
 19748                                  ;This is  the  default  number  of  files for the system.  This
 19749                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 19750                                  ;It is  DBed  to  8 in SYSINIT, values less than 5 are ignored.
 19751                                  ;
 19752                                  ;   SYSINIT                 FAR
 19753                                  ;
 19754                                  ;The entry  point  of  the  SYSINIT  module.  OEM BIOS jumps to
 19755                                  ;this label at the end of its INIT code.
 19756                                  ;
 19757                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared public:
 19758                                  ;
 19759                                  ;   RE_INIT                 FAR
 19760                                  ;
 19761                                  ;This is an entry point which allows the BIOS to do some INIT
 19762                                  ;work  after  the  DOS is initialized.  ALL REGISTERS MUST BE
 19763                                  ;PRESERVED.  On entry DS points to the first available memory
 19764                                  ;(after  the DOS).  DS:0 points to a 100H byte program header
 19765                                  ;prefix which represents  the  "program"  currently  running.
 19766                                  ;This  program  should  be  thought  of  as  the OEM BIOS and
 19767                                  ;SYSINIT taken together.  This is not  a  normal  program  in
 19768                                  ;that  no  memory  is  allocated to it, it is running in free
 19769                                  ;memory.
 19770                                  ;NOTES:
 19771                                  ;     At the time this routine is called SYSINIT occupies the
 19772                                  ;highest 10K of memory ("highest" is determined by the  value
 19773                                  ;of the MEMORY_SIZE variable), DO NOT DO WRITES THERE.
 19774                                  ;     Since this is called AFTER DOS is initialized, you can
 19775                                  ;make system calls.  This also implies that the code for this
 19776                                  ;routine    CANNOT   be   thrown   away   by   use   of   the
 19777                                  ;FINAL_DOS_LOCATION since the DOS has already been moved.
 19778                                  ;     If you don't want  anything done just set this to point
 19779                                  ;at a FAR RET instruction.
 19780                                  
 19781                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 19782                                  ; TITLE   BIOS SYSTEM INITIALIZATION
 19783                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 19784

 19786                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------

 19843                                  DEVIOCTL EQU    4000h           ;Bit 14 - CONTROL mode bit
 19844                                  ISFATBYDEV EQU  2000h           ;Bit 13 - Device uses FAT ID bytes, comp media.
 19845                                  ISCIN   EQU     0001h           ;Bit 0 - This device is the console input.
 19846                                  ISCOUT  EQU     0002h           ;Bit 1 - This device is the console output.
 19847                                  ISNULL  EQU     0004h           ;Bit 2 - This device is the null device.
 19848                                  ISCLOCK EQU     0008h           ;Bit 3 - This device is the clock device.
 19849                                  ISIBM   EQU     0010h           ;Bit 4 - This device is special

 19864 00000001 ??                      .REQUNIT:	resb 1		;Device unit number

 19904 00000000 ??                      .fcb_drive:	resb 1
 19905 00000001 ????????????????        .fcb_name:	resb 8
 19906 00000009 ??????                  .fcb_ext:	resb 3
 19907 0000000C ????                    .fcb_EXTENT:	resw 1
 19908 0000000E ????                    .fcb_RECSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of record (user settable)
 19909 00000010 ????                    .fcb_FILSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of file in bytes; used with the following
 19910                                                          ; word
 19911 00000012 ????                    .fcb_DRVBP:	resw 1	; BP for SEARCH FIRST and SEARCH NEXT
 19912 00000014 ????                    .fcb_FDATE:	resw 1	; Date of last writing
 19913 00000016 ????                    .fcb_FTIME:	resw 1	; Time of last writing
 19914 00000018 ??                      .fcb_DEVID:	resb 1	; Device ID number, bits 0-5 if file.
 19915                                                          ; bit 7=0 for file, bit 7=1 for I/O device
 19916                                                          ; If file, bit 6=0 if dirty
 19917                                                          ; If I/O device, bit 6=0 if EOF (input)
 19918                                                          ;               Bit 5=1 if Raw mode
 19919                                                          ;               Bit 0=1 if console input device
 19920                                                          ;               Bit 1=1 if console output device
 19921                                                          ;               Bit 2=1 if null device
 19922                                                          ;               Bit 3=1 if clock device
 19923 00000019 ????                    .fcb_FIRCLUS:	resw 1	; First cluster of file
 19924 0000001B ????                    .fcb_CLUSPOS:	resw 1	; Position of last cluster accessed
 19925 0000001D ????                    .fcb_LSTCLUS:	resw 1	; Last cluster accessed and directory
 19926 0000001F ??                                   	resb 1	; pack 2 12 bit numbers into 24 bits...
 19927 00000020 ??                      .fcb_NR:	resb 1	; Next record
 19928 00000021 ????????                .fcb_RR:	resb 4	; Random record
 19929                                  .size:

 19932                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 19933                                  ; Field definition for I/O buffer information
 19934                                  
 19935                                  ; 22/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.0, BUFFER.INC, 1991)
 19936                                  
 19937                                  	; 03/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19938                                  
 19939                                  struc BUFFINFO
 19940 00000000 ????                    .buf_next:	resw 1		; Pointer to next buffer in list
 19941 00000002 ????                    .buf_prev:	resw 1		; Pointer to prev buffer in list
 19942 00000004 ??                      .buf_ID:	resb 1		; Drive of buffer (bit 7 = 0)
 19943                                  				; SFT table index (bit 7 = 1)
 19944                                  				; = FFH if buffer free
 19945 00000005 ??                      .buf_flags:	resb 1		; Bit 7 = 1 if Remote file buffer
 19946                                  				;	= 0 if Local device buffer
 19947                                  				; Bit 6 = 1 if buffer dirty
 19948                                  				; Bit 5 = Reserved
 19949                                  				; Bit 4 = Search bit (bit 7 = 1)
 19950                                  				; Bit 3 = 1 if buffer is DATA
 19951                                  				; Bit 2 = 1 if buffer is DIR
 19952                                  				; Bit 1 = 1 if buffer is FAT
 19953                                  				; Bit 0 = Reserved
 19954 00000006 ????????                .buf_sector:	resd 1		; Sector number of buffer (flags bit 7 = 0)
 19955                                  ; The next two items are often refed as a word (flags bit 7 = 0)
 19956 0000000A ??                      .buf_wrtcnt:	resb 1		; For FAT sectors, # times sector written out
 19957 0000000B ????                    .buf_wrtcntinc:	resw 1		; "   "     "   , # sectors between each write
 19958 0000000D ????                    		resw 1 ; * ; 03/01/2024 ; PCDOS 7.1
 19959                                  			   ; hw of sectors per FAT
 19960 0000000F ????????                .buf_DPB:	resd 1		; Pointer to drive parameters
 19961 00000013 ????                    .buf_fill:	resw 1		; How full buffer is (flags bit 7 = 1)
 19962 00000015 ??                      .buf_reserved:	resb 1		; make DWORD boundary for 386
 19963 00000016 ????                    		resw 1 ; * ; 03/01/2024 ; PCDOS 7.1
 19964                                  			   ; reserved word for dword boundary
 19965                                  .size:	; 20 bytes ; MSDOS 5.0 to 6.22
 19966                                  	; 24 bytes ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 03/01/2024
 19967                                  endstruc
 19968                                  
 19969                                  %define buf_offset	BUFFINFO.buf_sector ; 22/07/2019
 19970                                  				;For buf_flags bit 7 = 1, this is the byte
 19971                                  				;offset of the start of the buffer in
 19972                                  				;the file pointed to by buf_ID. Thus
 19973                                  				;the buffer starts at location
 19974                                  				;buf_offset in the file and contains
 19975                                  				;buf_fill bytes.
 19976                                  
 19977                                  bufinsiz	equ	BUFFINFO.size	; Size of structure in bytes
 19978                                  
 19979

 19988                                  buf_snbuf	EQU	00010000B

 19990                                  buf_isDATA	EQU	00001000B
 19991                                  buf_isDIR	EQU	00000100B
 19992                                  buf_isFAT	EQU	00000010B
 19993                                  buf_type_0	EQU	11110001B	; AND sets type to "none"
 19994
