 37619                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37620                                  	; ds = cs
 37621 00003342 8A87[0024]              	mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 37622                                  
 37623 00003346 08C0                    	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 37624                                  
 37625                                  	; 09/09/2023
 37626                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37627                                  	;pop	ax
 37628                                  
 37629 00003348 C3                      	retn
 37630                                  
 37631                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37632                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 37633                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37634                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 37635                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 37636                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 37637                                  ; USES:     Flags
 37638                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37639                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 37640                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 37641                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 37642                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 37643                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 37644                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37645                                  
 37646                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 37647                                  
 37648                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37649                                  
 37650                                  shrinkMCB:
 37651                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 37652                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37653                                  	;push	bx
 37654 00003349 51                      	push	cx
 37655 0000334A 06                      	push	es
 37656                                  
 37657 0000334B 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 37658                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37659                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 37660                                  
 37661 0000334D 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 37662                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37663 00003352 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 37664                                  
 37665 00003354 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 37666                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 37667                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 37668                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 37669                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37670                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 37671                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37672 00003357 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 37673 00003359 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 37674                                  
 37675 0000335B 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 37676                                  	
 37677                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 37678                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37679 00003360 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 37680                                  
 37681 00003362 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 37682 00003367 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 37683                                  
 37684 0000336D 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 37685 0000336F 40                      	inc	ax
 37686 00003370 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 37687                                  
 37688 00003372 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 37689 00003374 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 37690                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37691                                  	; ax > 0
 37692 00003376 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 37693                                  
 37694                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37695 00003377 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 37696                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 37697 0000337C 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 37698                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 37699                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 37700                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 37701                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 37702                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 37703                                  
 37704                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37705 00003380 E8A801                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 37706                                  
 37707                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37708                                  	; cf=0
 37709                                  	;clc
 37710                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37711                                  	;jmp	short smX
 37712                                  smE:	
 37713                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37714                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 37715                                  	;stc
 37716                                  smX:	
 37717                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 37718 00003383 07                      	pop	es
 37719 00003384 59                      	pop	cx
 37720                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37721                                  	;pop	bx
 37722 00003385 C3                      	retn
 37723                                  
 37724                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37725                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 37726                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37727                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 37728                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 37729                                  ; ERROR:    None
 37730                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 37731                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37732                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 37733                                  ;
 37734                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 37735                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 37736                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 37737                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 37738                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 37739                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 37740                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 37741                                  ;       Endif
 37742                                  ;    Endif
 37743                                  ; Endif
 37744                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 37745                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 37746                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 37747                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 37748                                  ;    ENDIF
 37749                                  ; ENDIF
 37750                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37751                                  
 37752                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37753                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 37754                                  _hideUMB_:
 37755                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37756                                  	; ds = cs
 37757                                  
 37758                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37759                                  	;push	bx
 37760                                  	;push	dx
 37761 00003386 06                      	push	es
 37762                                  
 37763 00003387 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 37764 00003389 E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 37765 0000338C 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 37766                                  
 37767 0000338E 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 37768 00003390 E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 37769 00003393 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 37770                                  
 37771 00003395 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 37772 00003396 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 37773 00003398 E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 37774 0000339B 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 37775                                  
 37776 0000339C 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 37777 0000339E 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 37778                                  
 37779 000033A0 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 37780 000033A2 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 37781                                  
 37782 000033A4 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 37783 000033A6 E81DFD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 37784 000033A9 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 37785                                  hu_10:	
 37786                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 37787                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 37788                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37789                                  ;isTiny:
 37790                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 37791                                  	;or	al,al
 37792 000033AB 800E[FC23]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 37793 000033B0 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 37794                                  
 37795 000033B2 E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 37796 000033B5 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 37797                                  
 37798 000033B7 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 37799 000033B9 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 37800                                  
 37801 000033BB 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 37802 000033BD E87EFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 37803 000033C0 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 37804                                  
 37805 000033C2 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 37806                                  hu_30:	
 37807 000033C4 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 37808                                  
 37809 000033C6 E89DFE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 37810                                  
 37811 000033C9 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 37812 000033CB 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 37813                                  
 37814 000033CD 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 37815 000033CF E8E6FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 37816                                  hu_X:	
 37817 000033D2 07                      	pop	es
 37818                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37819                                  	;pop	dx
 37820                                  	;pop	bx
 37821 000033D3 C3                      	retn
 37822                                  
 37823                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37824                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 37825                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37826                                  ; Entry:  None
 37827                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 37828                                  ; Error:  None
 37829                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 37830                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37831                                  
 37832                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37833                                  UnFreeze:
 37834                                  	; 03/01/2023
 37835                                  	;push	ax
 37836 000033D4 06                      	push	es
 37837                                  
 37838 000033D5 E8D5FD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 37839 000033D8 721C                    	jc	short ufX
 37840                                  
 37841                                  	; 22/07/2023
 37842                                  uf10:
 37843 000033DA 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; *
 37844                                  
 37845                                  ; ------------------------------
 37846                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 37847                                  ; ------------------------------
 37848                                  
 37849                                  ;uf10:	
 37850 000033DC E81900                  	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 37851 000033DF 7505                    	jnz	short uf20
 37852 000033E1 E8D4FE                  	call	unHideMCB
 37853                                  	; 09/09/2023
 37854                                  	; ax <> es

 38012                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38013                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 38014                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 38017                                  ; ERROR:    None

 38047                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38048                                  ; ENTRY:    None

 38050                                  ; ERROR:    None

 38058                                  	;push	ax ; ?

 38080 0000349D 7408                    	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.

 38101

 38103                                  
 38104                                  	;pop	es ; ?
 38105                                  	;;pop	ds ; ? ; 01/01/2023 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, SYSINIT:353Dh)
 38106                                  	;pop	bx ; ?
 38107                                  	;pop	ax ; ?
 38108                                  	
 38109 000034AA C3                      	retn

 38357                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)

 38365                                  HeadUmb:

 38429                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38430                                  ;
 38431                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 38432                                  ;
 38433                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 38434                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 38435                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 38436                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 38437                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 38438                                  ;
 38439                                  ;	Output : none
 38440                                  ;
 38441                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 38442                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 38443                                  ;
 38444                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38445                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 38446                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 38447                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 38448                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 38449                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38450                                  
 38451                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38452                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38453                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 38454                                  InitDevLoad:
 38455                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38456                                  	;push	es ; *
 38457                                  
 38458                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38459                                  	; ds = cs
 38460 00003565 803E[5124]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 38461                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 38462                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 38463 0000356A 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 38464                                  
 38465                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38466                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38467                                  ; %if 0
 38468                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38469 0000356C 803E[4124]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 38470                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 38471 00003571 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 38472                                  
 38473                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 38474                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 38475                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 38476                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 38477                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 38478                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 38479                                  
 38480 00003573 E85904                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 38481                                  
 38482 00003576 E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 38483 00003579 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 38484 0000357C E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 38485 0000357F 9C                      	pushf
 38486 00003580 E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 38487 00003583 9D                      	popf
 38488                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 38489                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 38490                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38491 00003584 EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 38492                                  
 38493                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 38494                                  
 38495                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38496                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 38497                                  InitForConv:
 38498                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38499                                  	; ds = cs
 38500 00003586 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 38501                                  					;  current UMB ?
 38502 00003589 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 38503 0000358B E84104                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 38504 0000358E E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 38505                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 38506 00003591 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 38507                                  					;  in low memory
 38508                                  InitForHi:
 38509                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38510                                  	; ds = cs
 38511                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 38512                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 38513                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 38514 00003593 A1[4724]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 38515 00003596 8B16[4324]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 38516 0000359A 0316[4524]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 38517 0000359E EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 38518                                  
 38519                                  InitForLo:
 38520                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38521                                  	; ds = cs
 38522                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 38523 000035A0 C606[5124]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 38524                                  initforlo_x:
 38525                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38526                                  	; ds = cs
 38527                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 38528                                  					;  we are loading low
 38529                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 38530                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 38531 000035A5 A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 38532 000035A8 8B16[A502]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 38533                                  idl1:
 38534 000035AC E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 38535                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38536                                  	; ds = cs
 38537                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 38538                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 38539                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 38540                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 38541 000035AF A3[3524]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 38542 000035B2 8916[3724]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 38543 000035B6 C706[3924]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 38544 000035BC A3[3B24]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 38545                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38546                                  	;pop	es ; *
 38547 000035BF C3                      	retn
 38548                                  
 38549                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38550                                  ;
 38551                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 38552                                  ;
 38553                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 38554                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 38555                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 38556                                  ;		   current UMB
 38557                                  ;
 38558                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38559

 38568 000035C7 2B06[4724]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 38569                                  	; 11/12/2022

 38571                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1

 38573                                  	;retn
 38574                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38575 000035CB 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1

 38577                                  spcinumb1:
 38578 000035D0 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 38579                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38580                                  	; ds = cs
 38581 000035D1 3B06[3324]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 38582                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 38583                                  spcinumb2:
 38584 000035D5 C3                      	retn

 38592                                  ;

 38610                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38611                                  ;
 38612                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 38613                                  ;
 38614                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 38615                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 38616                                  ;		 the device.
 38617                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 38618                                  ;
 38619                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 38620                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 38621                                  ;	UMB.
 38622                                  ;
 38623                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 38624                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 38625                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 38626                                  ;
 38627                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38628                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38629                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 38630                                  
 38631                                  GetUMBForDev:
 38632                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38633                                  	; ds = cs
 38634 000035D6 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 38635 000035D9 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 38636 000035DC CD21                    	int	21h
 38637                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 38638                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 38639                                  
 38640 000035DE 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 38641                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 38642                                  	; 09/09/2023
 38643 000035E0 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 38644                                  
 38645 000035E2 4B                      	dec	bx
 38646                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38647                                  	; ds = cs
 38648 000035E3 391E[3324]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 38649                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 38650 000035E7 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 38651                                  
 38652 000035E9 43                      	inc	bx
 38653                                  
 38654 000035EA B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 38655 000035ED CD21                    	int	21h
 38656 000035EF 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 38657                                  
 38658                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38659                                  	;dec	ax
 38660                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 38661                                  	;
 38662                                  PrepareMark:
 38663 000035F1 1E                      	push	ds
 38664 000035F2 48                      	dec	ax
 38665 000035F3 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 38666 000035F5 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 38667 000035FB C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 38668 00003601 40                      	inc	ax
 38669 00003602 1F                      	pop	ds
 38670                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38671                                  	; ds = cs
 38672                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 38673                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 38674                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 38675                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 38676 00003603 891E[4524]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 38677 00003607 A3[4324]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 38678 0000360A A3[4724]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 38679                                  	;
 38680                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38681                                  	; cf=0
 38682                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 38683 0000360D C3                      	retn
 38684

 38686                                  %if 1
 38687                                  gufd_err:

 38689                                  gufd_error:

 38693                                  %endif

 38696                                  %if 0
 38697                                  gufd_err:
 38698                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 38699                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38700                                  	; ds = cs

 38702                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax

 38712                                  ;
 38713                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 38714                                  ;
 38715                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 38716                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 38717                                  ;
 38718                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 38719                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 38720                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 38721                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 38722                                  ;
 38723                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 38724                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 38725                                  ;
 38726                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38727                                  
 38728                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38729                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 38730                                  
 38731                                  DevSetMark:
 38732 00003615 06                      	push	es
 38733                                  	; 03/01/2023
 38734                                  	;push	di
 38735 00003616 1E                      	push	ds
 38736 00003617 56                      	push	si
 38737 00003618 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 38738 0000361A 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 38739 00003620 40                      	inc	ax
 38740 00003621 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 38741                                  
 38742                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 38743                                  
 38744 00003625 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 38745                                  
 38746                                  	; 09/09/2023
 38747                                  	; ds = cs
 38748                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 38749 00003626 C536[8103]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 38750                                  
 38751 0000362A 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 38752 0000362C FC                      	cld
 38753                                  dsm_again:
 38754 0000362D AC                      	lodsb
 38755 0000362E 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 38756 00003630 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 38757 00003632 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 38758 00003634 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 38759                                  isit_slash:
 38760 00003636 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 38761 00003638 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 38762 0000363A 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 38763 0000363C EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 38764                                  isit_null:
 38765 0000363E 08C0                    	or	al,al
 38766 00003640 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 38767 00003642 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 38768                                  
 38769 00003644 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 38770 00003647 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 38771                                  dsm_next_char:
 38772 0000364A AC                      	lodsb
 38773 0000364B 08C0                    	or	al, al
 38774 0000364D 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 38775 0000364F 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 38776 00003651 7403                    	je	short blankout
 38777 00003653 AA                      	stosb
 38778 00003654 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 38779                                  blankout:
 38780 00003656 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 38781 00003658 B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 38782 0000365A F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 38783                                  dsm_exit:
 38784 0000365C 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 38785 0000365D 5E                      	pop	si
 38786 0000365E 1F                      	pop	ds
 38787                                  	; 03/01/2023
 38788                                  	;pop	di
 38789 0000365F 07                      	pop	es
 38790 00003660 C3                      	retn
 38791                                  
 38792                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38793                                  ;
 38794                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 38795                                  ;
 38796                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 38797                                  ;
 38798                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 38799                                  ;
 38800                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 38801                                  ;	in DevSize
 38802                                  ;
 38803                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38804                                  
 38805                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38806                                  SizeDevice:
 38807                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38808                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 38809 00003661 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 38810 00003662 06                      	push	es
 38811 00003663 1F                      	pop	ds
 38812 00003664 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 38813 00003666 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 38814 00003669 CD21                    	int	21h
 38815 0000366B 7237                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 38816                                  
 38817 0000366D 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 38818 0000366F B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 38819 00003672 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 38820 00003674 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 38821 00003676 CD21                    	int	21h
 38822 00003678 7223                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 38823 0000367A 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 38824 0000367D 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 38825 00003680 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffffh paras ?
 38826                                  	;jz	short szdev1		; no
 38827                                  	; 22/07/2023
 38828 00003684 7409                    	jz	short sd_ctp
 38829 00003686 2EC706[3324]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 38830                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 38831 0000368D EB0E                    	jmp	short sd_close
 38832                                  sd_ctp:	
 38833                                  	; 22/07/2023
 38834                                  ;szdev1:
 38835 0000368F B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 38836 00003691 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 38837 00003693 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 38838 00003695 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 38839 00003697 09D0                    	or	ax,dx ; * ; cf=0
 38840                                  	;
 38841                                  	; 22/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimized)
 38842                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:37A6h 
 38843                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38844                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 38845                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 38846                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 38847                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38848                                  	;clc
 38849                                  ;szdev2:
 38850 00003699 2EA3[3324]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size (in paragraps)
 38851                                  	; 22/07/2023
 38852                                  	;clc ; cf=0 ; *	; CLC is not needed here
 38853                                  			; (OR instruction clears CF) - E.TAN 22/07/2023
 38854                                  
 38855                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38856                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38857                                  	; cf=0
 38858                                  	;clc
 38859                                  sd_close:
 38860 0000369D 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our

 39243                                  ;
 39244                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 39245                                  ;
 39246                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 39247                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 39248                                  ;
 39249                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 39250                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 39251                                  ;
 39252                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 39253                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 39254                                  ;
 39255                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39256                                  
 39257                                  ; 13/05/2019
 39258                                  
 39259                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39260                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 39261                                  
 39262                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 39263                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 39264                                  GetHexNum:
 39265 00003799 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 39266 0000379B 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 39267                                  ghn_next:
 39268 0000379D 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 39269 000037A0 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 39270 000037A3 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 39271 000037A5 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 39272 000037A8 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 39273 000037AA 50                      	push	ax
 39274 000037AB 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 39275 000037AD E8DA0F                  	call	delim
 39276 000037B0 58                      	pop	ax
 39277                                  	; 03/01/2023
 39278 000037B1 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 39279 000037B4 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 39280 000037B6 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 39281                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 39282                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39283 000037B9 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 39284                                  	; 03/01/2023
 39285                                  	;mov	cx,4
 39286                                  ghn_shift1:
 39287 000037BB D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 39288 000037BD D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 39289 000037BF E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 39290 000037C1 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 39291 000037C3 46                      	inc	si
 39292 000037C4 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 39293                                  ghn_into_paras:
 39294 000037C6 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 39295 000037C9 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 39296 000037CC F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 39297 000037D0 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 39298                                  	; 03/01/2023
 39299                                  	;mov	cx,4
 39300                                  ghn_shift2:
 39301 000037D2 F8                      	clc
 39302 000037D3 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 39303 000037D5 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 39304 000037D7 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 39305 000037D9 F8                      	clc
 39306 000037DA C3                      	retn
 39307                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39308                                  ghn_err:
 39309                                  gnib_err:
 39310 000037DB F9                      	stc
 39311                                  ghn_ret:
 39312                                  gnib_ret:
 39313 000037DC C3                      	retn

 39317                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 39318                                  ;
 39319                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 39320                                  ;
 39321                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 39322                                  ;
 39323                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 39324                                  ;
 39325                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39326                                  
 39327                                  GetNibble:
 39328 000037DD 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 39329                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 39330                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39331 000037E0 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 39332 000037E2 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 39333 000037E5 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 39334 000037E7 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 39335 000037EA C3                      	retn
 39336                                  is_it_hex:
 39337 000037EB 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 39338                                  	;jb	short gnib_err

 39340 000037EE 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 39341 000037F0 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 39342 000037F3 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 39343 000037F5 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 39344 000037F8 C3                      	retn

 39348                                  ;	stc

 39365                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39366                                  ;
 39367                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 39368                                  ;
 39369                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 39370                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 39371                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 39372                                  ;			; DS = data
 39373                                  ;
 39374                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 39375                                  ;
 39376                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 39377                                  ;
 39378                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39379                                  
 39380                                  umb_insert:
 39381 000037F9 1E                      	push	ds
 39382                                  
 39383                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39384                                  	; ds = cs
 39385                                  
 39386                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 39387 000037FA 8E1E[6024]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 39388                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 39389 000037FE 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 39390 00003802 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 39391 00003804 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 39392                                  ui_next:
 39393 00003806 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 39394                                  					;    new block
 39395 00003808 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 39396                                  					; Q: is current block the
 39397                                  					;    last
 39398 0000380A 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 39399 00003810 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 39400                                  					; N: get next block

 39402                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 39403 00003814 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 39404 00003817 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 39405                                  
 39406                                  ui_insert:
 39407 00003819 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 39408 0000381B 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 39409

 39411 0000381E F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 39412                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 39413 00003820 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 39414                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 39415 00003825 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 39416                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 39417 0000382B 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 39418                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 39419 0000382F C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 39420                                  
 39421                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 39422

 39426                                  					; mark as free

 39428                                  					; start & end of new block
 39429 00003847 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 39430

 39432

 39437

 39439                                  					; this block

 39441                                  	
 39442 00003854 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 39443 0000385A 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 39444 00003861 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 39445 00003865 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 39446                                  
 39447 0000386C EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 39448                                  
 39449                                  ui_append:
 39450                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 39451 0000386E 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 39452 00003873 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 39453                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 39454                                  					; block for the next arena.
 39455                                  	; 13/05/2019
 39456 00003879 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal

 39459 00003881 40                      	inc	ax
 39460 00003882 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 39461                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 39462 00003884 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 39463                                  
 39464 00003886 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block

 39475                                  					; mark as free

 39478                                  ui_done:

 39482                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022

 39487                                  ;
 39488                                  ; procedure : AllocUMB
 39489                                  ;
 39490                                  ;	Allocate all UMBs and link it to DOS arena chain
 39491                                  ;
 39492                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39493                                  
 39494                                  AllocUMB:
 39495                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39496                                  	; ds = cs
 39497 000038B7 E84700                  	call	InitAllocUMB		; link in the first UMB
 39498 000038BA 72FA                    	jc	short au_exit		; quit on error
 39499                                  au_next:
 39500 000038BC E87000                  	call	umb_allocate		; allocate
 39501 000038BF 7205                    	jc	short au_coalesce
 39502 000038C1 E835FF                  	call	umb_insert		; & insert till no UMBs
 39503 000038C4 EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 39504                                  au_coalesce:
 39505                                  	; 09/09/2023
 39506                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs
 39507                                  ;au_exit:
 39508                                  ;	; 31/12/2022
 39509                                  ;	; ds = cs
 39510                                  ;	retn
 39511                                  
 39512                                  	; 09/09/2023
 39513                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 39514                                  
 39515                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39516                                  
 39517                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 39518                                  
 39519                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39520                                  ;
 39521                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 39522                                  ;
 39523                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 39524                                  ;	if it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 39525                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 39526                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 39527                                  ;
 39528                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 39529                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 39530                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 39531                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 39532                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 39533                                  ;
 39534                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39535                                  
 39536                                  umb_coalesce:
 39537                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39538                                  	; ds = cs
 39539 000038C6 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 39540                                  
 39541 000038C7 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 39542                                  
 39543                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 39544                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39545 000038C9 8E06[6024]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 39546 000038CD 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 39547                                  uc_nextfree:
 39548 000038D2 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 39549 000038D4 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 39550                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 39551 000038D6 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 39552 000038DB 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 39553                                  					; N: get next arena
 39554 000038DD E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 39555 000038E0 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 39556 000038E2 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 39557                                  uc_again:
 39558 000038E4 E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 39559 000038E7 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 39560                                  uc_check:
 39561 000038E9 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 39562 000038EE 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 39563                                  					; Y: coalesce
 39564 000038F0 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 39565 000038F5 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 39566                                  	;add	[3],cx
 39567 000038F6 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 39568 000038FA 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 39569 000038FD 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 39570 000038FF EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 39571                                  
 39572                                  	; 18/12/2022
 39573                                  ;uc_done:
 39574                                  	;retn
 39575

 39589                                  	; 31/12/2022

 39591                                  	;mov	[cs:DevDOSData],es	; & save it for later
 39592 0000390A 8C06[6024]              	mov	[DevDOSData],es		; & save it for later
 39593 0000390E B81043                  	mov	ax,4310h
 39594 00003911 CD2F                    	int	2Fh

 39596                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr+2],es
 39597 00003913 891E[4924]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr],bx		; get XMS driver address
 39598 00003917 8C06[4B24]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr+2],es	
 39599                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39600 0000391B 803E[5F24]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0 
 39601                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0 ; have we already linked a UMB?
 39602                                  	;jne	short ia_1		; quit if we already did it

 39623                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39624                                  ;
 39625                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 39626                                  ;
 39627                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 39628                                  ;
 39629                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 39630                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 39631                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 39632                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 39633                                  ;				NC
 39634                                  ;			  else 
 39635                                  ;				CY
 39636                                  ;
 39637                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 39638                                  ;
 39639                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39640                                  
 39641                                  umb_allocate:
 39642                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39643                                  	; ds = cs
 39644 0000392F 50                      	push	ax
 39645 00003930 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 39646 00003932 BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 39647                                  					;   possible
 39648                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39649 00003935 FF1E[4924]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 39650                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 39651                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 39652                                  					; the largest UMB
 39653 00003939 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 39654 0000393B 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 39655                                  	
 39656 0000393D B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 39657                                  
 39658                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39659 0000393F FF1E[4924]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 39660                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 39661                                  
 39662 00003943 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 39663                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 39664                                  	; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 39665 00003946 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 39666                                  ua_err:
 39667 00003948 F9                      	stc	
 39668                                  
 39669                                  	;clc
 39670                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39671                                  	; 12/12/2022
 39672                                  	; cf=0
 39673                                  	;clc 
 39674                                  ua_done:
 39675 00003949 58                      	pop	ax
 39676 0000394A C3                      	retn
 39677                                  	; 27/07/2023
 39678                                  ;ua_err:
 39679                                  	;stc
 39680                                  	;jmp	short ua_done

 39682                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39683                                  ;
 39684                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 39685                                  ;
 39686                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 39687                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 39688                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 39689                                  ;
 39690                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39691                                  
 39692                                  	; 01/11/2022
 39693                                  get_next:
 39694 0000394B 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 39695 00003950 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 39696                                  _get_next_:
 39697 00003952 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 39698 00003954 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 39699 00003958 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 39700 00003959 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 39701                                  	;clc
 39702                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39703                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39704                                  	; cf=0
 39705                                  	;clc
 39706 0000395B C3                      	retn
 39707                                  gn_err:
 39708 0000395C F9                      	stc
 39709                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 39710                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 39711 0000395D C3                      	retn

 39713                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39714                                  ;
 39715                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 39716                                  ;
 39717                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39718                                  
 39719                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 39720                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 39721                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 39722                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39723                                  	; ds = cs
 39724 0000395E E8CEFF                  	call	umb_allocate
 39725 00003961 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 39726                                  
 39727                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 39728                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 39729                                  
 39730                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39731                                  	; ds = cs
 39732                                  
 39733 00003963 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 39734 00003965 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 39735 00003967 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 39736                                  
 39737 00003969 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 39738 0000396B 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 39739                                  
 39740 0000396D F7D8                    	neg	ax
 39741                                  
 39742                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 39743                                  	; 09/09/2023
 39744 0000396F 49                      	dec	cx
 39745 00003970 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 39746                                  	
 39747 00003972 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 39748 00003978 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 39749                                  					
 39750 0000397F 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 39751 00003983 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 39752                                  
 39753                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 39754                                  
 39755 0000398A 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 39756 0000398C 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 39757 00003992 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 39758                                  					; mark as free 
 39759 00003999 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 39760 0000399A 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 39761                                  
 39762                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 39763                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39764 0000399F 8E06[6024]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 39765 000039A3 BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 39766 000039A6 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 39767                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 39768                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 39769                                  
 39770                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 39771                                  
 39772 000039A9 BF2400                  	mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 39773 000039AC 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 39774 000039AF 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 39775                                  ;scan_next
 39776                                  ; 09/12/2022
 39777                                  scannext:
 39778 000039B1 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 39779 000039B5 740C                    	je	short got_last
 39780                                  	
 39781 000039B7 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 39782 000039B9 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 39783 000039BE 40                      	inc	ax
 39784 000039BF 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 39785                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 39786                                  	; 09/12/2022
 39787 000039C1 EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 39788                                  got_last:
 39789                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 39790                                  	; 09/09/2023
 39791 000039C3 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 39792                                  
 39793 000039C8 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 39794                                  	;clc
 39795                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39796                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39797                                  	; cf=0
 39798                                  	;clc
 39799 000039CE C3                      	retn
 39800                                  
 39801                                  ; 11/12/2022
 39802                                  ;;lfu_err:
 39803                                  ;	;stc
 39804                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39805                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 39806                                  ;	; cf=1
 39807                                  ;	;stc
 39808                                  ;	retn

 39810                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39811                                  ;
 39812                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 39813                                  ;
 39814                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 39815                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 39816                                  ;
 39817                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39818                                  
 39819                                  ShrinkUMB:
 39820                                  	; 12/12/2022
 39821                                  	; ds = cs
 39822 000039CF 833E[4324]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 39823                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 39824 000039D4 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 39825 000039D6 06                      	push	es
 39826                                  	; 01/01/2023
 39827                                  	;push	bx
 39828                                  	; 12/12/2022
 39829                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 39830                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 39831                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 39832 000039D7 8B1E[4724]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 39833 000039DB 2B1E[4324]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 39834 000039DF 8E06[4324]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 39835                                  	
 39836 000039E3 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 39837 000039E6 CD21                    	int	21h
 39838                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 39839                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 39840                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 39841 000039E8 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 39842 000039EA 48                      	dec	ax
 39843 000039EB 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 39844 000039ED 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 39845                                  	; 01/01/2023
 39846                                  	;pop	bx
 39847 000039F4 07                      	pop	es
 39848                                  su_exit:
 39849 000039F5 C3                      	retn
