 41820 00004161 8E1E[6219]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 41821 00004165 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 41822                                  
 41823                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 41824                                  ;
 41825                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 41826                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 41827                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 41828                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 41829                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 41830                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 41831                                  ;
 41832                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 41833                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 41834                                  
 41835                                  copyblock_loop:
 41836 00004167 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 41837 00004168 E82F01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 41838 0000416B 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 41839 0000416C 7232                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 41840                                  
 41841                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 41842                                  
 41843                                  copyblock_begin:
 41844                                  
 41845                                  ; 10/09/2023
 41846                                  %if 0
 41847                                          push    ax              ;
 41848                                          push    cx              ;
 41849                                          push    si              ;
 41850                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 41851                                          mov     di,szCommon
 41852                                          push    ds              ;
 41853                                          push    cs              ;
 41854                                          pop     ds              ;
 41855                                          call    comp_names      ;
 41856                                          pop     ds              ;
 41857                                          pop     di              ;
 41858                                          pop     si              ;
 41859                                          pop     cx              ;
 41860                                          pop     ax              ;
 41861                                          je	short copyblock_check
 41862                                  %endif
 41863                                  	; 10/09/2023
 41864 0000416E 57                      	push	di
 41865 0000416F BF[CB4C]                	mov	di,szCommon	; always do "common" blocks
 41866 00004172 E81602                  	call	comp_names_x	; (comp_names_safe)
 41867 00004175 5F                      	pop	di
 41868 00004176 740F                    	je	short copyblock_check
 41869                                  
 41870 00004178 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 41871 0000417A 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 41872 0000417C 57                              push    di              ;
 41873 0000417D 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 41874 0000417F 1E                              push    ds              ;
 41875 00004180 06                              push    es              ;
 41876 00004181 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 41877 00004182 E8E501                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 41878 00004185 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 41879 00004186 5F                              pop     di              ;
 41880                                  copyblock_check:
 41881 00004187 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 41882 00004189 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip ;
 41883 0000418B E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 41884 0000418E EBD7                            jmp	short copyblock_loop
 41885                                  
 41886                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 41887 00004190 E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 41888 00004193 E87804                          call    get_char        ;
 41889 00004196 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 41890 00004198 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 41891 0000419A 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 41892 0000419C 74D0                            je	short copyblock_begin
 41893 0000419E EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 41894                                  ;
 41895                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 41896                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 41897                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 41898                                  ;
 41899                                  move_config:
 41900 000041A0 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 41901 000041A2 51                              push    cx              ;
 41902                                  ;
 41903                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 41904                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 41905                                  ;
 41906                                   	;mov	cx,7
 41907 000041A3 B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 41908 000041A6 BE[BE4C]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 41909 000041A9 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 41910                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 41911                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 41912                                  copy_boot: 
 41913                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 41914 000041AA 2E                              cs
 41915 000041AB AC                      	lodsb
 41916 000041AC 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 41917 000041AE 47                              inc     di              ;
 41918 000041AF E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 41919                                  
 41920 000041B1 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 41921                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 41922                                  	; 04/01/2023
 41923 000041B2 B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 41924 000041B4 2E8B36[884C]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 41925 000041B9 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 41926 000041BB 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 41927 000041BD 0E                              push    cs              ;
 41928 000041BE 07                              pop     es              ;
 41929 000041BF BE[CB4C]                        mov     si,szCommon
 41930 000041C2 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 41931 000041C5 E8B205                          call    any_delim       ;
 41932 000041C8 7406                            je	short l2	;
 41933 000041CA 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 41934 000041CC 46                              inc     si              ;
 41935 000041CD 47                              inc     di              ;
 41936 000041CE E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 41937 000041D0 C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 41938 000041D3 07                              pop     es              ;
 41939                                  
 41940                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 41941                                  
 41942 000041D4 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 41943 000041D6 2E893E[6019]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 41944 000041DB 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 41945 000041DD 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 41946                                  
 41947 000041DE 51                              push    cx              ;
 41948 000041DF F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 41949 000041E1 59                              pop     cx              ;
 41950 000041E2 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 41951 000041E4 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 41952                                  
 41953                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 41954                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 41955                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 41956                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 41957                                  ;   is empty.
 41958                                  
 41959 000041E5 06                              push    es              ;
 41960 000041E6 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 41961 000041E8 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 41962 000041E9 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 41963 000041EF E82600                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 41964 000041F2 07                              pop     es
 41965                                  
 41966                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 41967                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 41968                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 41969                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 41970                                  
 41971                                  menu_done:
 41972 000041F3 803E[7D4C]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 41973 000041F8 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 41974 000041FA 06                              push    es              ;
 41975 000041FB B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 41976 000041FE 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 41977 00004200 A1[834C]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 41978 00004203 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 41979 00004207 A0[824C]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 41980 0000420A 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 41981 0000420E 07                              pop     es              ;
 41982                                  menu_exit:
 41983 0000420F 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 41984 00004213 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 41985                                          ; 10/09/2023 (*) - Erdogan Tan
 41986                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:46D3h
 41987                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:491Ah
 41988                                  	;sub	si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 41989 00004217 C3                      	retn
 41990                                  
 41991                                  ; (*) NOTE: MSDOS 6.0 source code (SYSINIT2.ASM) contains 'sub si,si' at this
 41992                                  ;	position (then 'retn' just after it)
 41993                                  ;	but MSDOS 6.21 and PCDOS 7.1 SYSINITs contain only 'retn' here.
 41994                                  
 41995                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41996                                  ;
 41997                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 41998                                  ;
 41999                                  ;   INPUT
 42000                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 42001                                  ;
 42002                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42003                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 42004                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 42005                                  ;
 42006                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42007                                  ;       None
 42008                                  ;
 42009                                  ;   NOTES
 42010                                  ;       None
 42011                                  ;
 42012                                  ;   HISTORY
 42013                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42014                                  ;
 42015                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42016                                  
 42017                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 42018                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 42019                                  
 42020                                  copy_envvar:
 42021 00004218 51                              push    cx              ;
 42022 00004219 56                              push    si              ;
 42023 0000421A 1E                              push    ds              ;
 42024 0000421B 06                              push    es              ;
 42025 0000421C 06                              push    es              ;
 42026 0000421D 8E06[6219]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 42027 00004221 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 42028                                  
 42029                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 42030                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 42031                                  ;   config.sys line)
 42032                                  ;
 42033                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 42034                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 42035                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 42036                                  
 42037 00004222 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 42038                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 42039 00004224 AC                              lodsb                   ;
 42040 00004225 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 42041                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 42042 00004227 746B                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 42043 00004229 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr           ;
 42044                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 42045 0000422B 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 42046 0000422D 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf           ;
 42047                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 42048 0000422F 7463                            je	short copy_envexit
 42049 00004231 41                              inc     cx              ;
 42050 00004232 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 42051 00004234 75EE                            jne	short copy_varlen
 42052 00004236 B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 42053 00004238 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 42054 0000423A 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 42055 0000423C 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 42056 0000423D 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 42057                                  copy_varsrch:
 42058 0000423F 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 42059 00004242 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 42060 00004244 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 42061 00004246 51                              push    cx              ;
 42062 00004247 56                              push    si              ;
 42063 00004248 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 42064 0000424A 5E                              pop     si              ;
 42065 0000424B 59                              pop     cx              ;
 42066 0000424C 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 42067 0000424E 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 42068 00004252 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 42069                                  
 42070                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 42071                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 42072                                  
 42073 00004254 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 42074 00004257 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 42075 00004259 56                              push    si              ;
 42076 0000425A 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 42077 0000425C 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 42078 0000425E 2E8B0E[6019]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 42079 00004263 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 42080                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 42081                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 42082                                  
 42083 00004265 F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 42084 00004266 26                      	es	; 26h
 42085 00004267 A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 42086                                  
 42087 00004268 5E                      	pop     si
 42088                                  copy_envprep:
 42089 00004269 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 42090 0000426C 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 42091 0000426E 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 42092 00004271 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 42093                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 42094                                  	; 04/01/2023
 42095                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 42096 00004273 AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 42097 00004274 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 42098 00004276 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 42099 00004278 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 42100 0000427A 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 42101 0000427C AA                      	stosb                   ;
 42102 0000427D EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 42103                                  
 42104                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 42105 0000427F 51                              push    cx              ;
 42106 00004280 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 42107 00004283 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 42108 00004285 59                              pop     cx              ;
 42109 00004286 EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 42110                                  
 42111                                  	; 04/01/2023
 42112                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 42113                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 42114                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 42115                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 42116                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 42117                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 42118                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 42119                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 42120                                  
 42121                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 42122 00004288 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 42123 0000428A AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 42124                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 42125 0000428B 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 42126 0000428E 2E893E[6019]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 42127                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 42128 00004293 F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 42129                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 42130 00004294 F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 42131 00004295 07                              pop     es              ;
 42132 00004296 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 42133 00004297 5E                              pop     si              ;
 42134 00004298 59                              pop     cx              ;
 42135                                  
 42136                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 42137 00004299 C3                              retn
 42138                                  
 42139                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42140                                  ;
 42141                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 42142                                  ;
 42143                                  ;   INPUT
 42144                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 42145                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 42146                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 42147                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 42148                                  ;
 42149                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42150                                  ;       Same as above
 42151                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 42152                                  ;
 42153                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42154                                  ;       All
 42155                                  ;
 42156                                  ;   NOTES
 42157                                  ;       None
 42158                                  ;
 42159                                  ;   HISTORY
 42160                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42161                                  ;
 42162                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42163                                  
 42164                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 42165                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 42166                                  
 42167                                  copy_block:
 42168 0000429A E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 42169 0000429D 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 42170 0000429F 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 42171 000042A1 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 42172 000042A3 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 42173                                  
 42174 000042A5 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 42175 000042A7 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 42176 000042A9 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 42177                                  
 42178                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 42179                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 42180                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 42181                                  
 42182 000042AB 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 42183 000042B0 57                              push    di              ;
 42184                                  
 42185 000042B1 BF[C64C]                        mov     di,szMenu
 42186 000042B4 E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 42187 000042B7 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 42188                                  
 42189 000042B9 BF[CB4C]                        mov     di,szCommon
 42190 000042BC E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 42191 000042BF 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 42192                                  
 42193 000042C1 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 42194 000042C3 E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 42195 000042C6 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 42196                                  	; 10/09/2023
 42197                                  	;pop    di              ;
 42198 000042C8 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 42199 000042CA 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 42200 000042CB 51                              push    cx              ;
 42201 000042CC 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 42202 000042CE 56                              push    si              ;
 42203 000042CF 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 42204 000042D0 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 42205 000042D2 E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 42206 000042D5 E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 42207 000042D8 5E                              pop     si              ;
 42208 000042D9 59                              pop     cx              ;

 42210 000042DC EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 42211                                  
 42212                                  copy_error:
 42213                                  	; 10/09/2023
 42214 000042DE F8                      	clc
 42215                                  copy_skip:
 42216 000042DF 5F                              pop     di
 42217                                  ;copy_error:
 42218                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 42219                                  	;clc                    ;
 42220 000042E0 E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 42221 000042E3 EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 42222                                  
 42223                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 42224                                  
 42225                                  copy_line:

 42227 000042E7 47                              inc     di              ;
 42228 000042E8 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 42229 000042EA 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 42230 000042EC 2E803E[6519]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 42231 000042F2 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 42232 000042F4 E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 42233 000042F7 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 42234 000042F9 47                              inc     di              ;
 42235 000042FA 47                              inc     di              ;
 42236 000042FB EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 42237                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 42238 000042FD E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 42239 00004300 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 42240 00004302 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 42241 00004304 47                              inc     di              ;
 42242                                  copy_next:
 42243 00004305 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 42244 00004307 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 42245                                  
 42246                                  copy_nextline:
 42247 00004309 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 42248 0000430C EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block

 42250                                  	; 18/12/2022
 42251                                  ;copy_done:
 42252                                          ;retn
 42253                                  
 42254                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42255                                  ;
 42256                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 42257                                  ;
 42258                                  ;   INPUT
 42259                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 42260                                  ;
 42261                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42262                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 42263                                  ;
 42264                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42265                                  ;       DX
 42266                                  ;
 42267                                  ;   NOTES
 42268                                  ;       None
 42269                                  ;
 42270                                  ;   HISTORY
 42271                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42272                                  ;
 42273                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42274                                  
 42275                                  get_linenum:
 42276 0000430E 50                              push    ax              ;
 42277 0000430F 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 42278 00004311 51                              push    cx              ;
 42279 00004312 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 42280 00004314 56                              push    si              ;
 42281 00004315 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 42282 0000431A 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 42283                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 42284 0000431C E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 42285 0000431F 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 42286 00004321 43                              inc     bx              ;
 42287 00004322 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 42288 00004324 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 42289                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 42290 00004326 5E                              pop     si              ;
 42291 00004327 59                              pop     cx              ;
 42292 00004328 58                              pop     ax              ;
 42293 00004329 C3                              retn
 42294                                  
 42295                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42296                                  ;
 42297                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 42298                                  ;
 42299                                  ;   INPUT
 42300                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 42301                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 42302                                  ;
 42303                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42304                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 42305                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 42306                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 42307                                  ;
 42308                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42309                                  ;       None
 42310                                  ;
 42311                                  ;   NOTES
 42312                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 42313                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 42314                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 42315                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 42316                                  ;
 42317                                  ;   HISTORY
 42318                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42319                                  ;
 42320                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42321                                  
 42322                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 42323 0000432A 50                              push    ax              ;
 42324 0000432B 51                              push    cx              ;
 42325 0000432C 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 42326 00004331 56                              push    si              ;
 42327 00004332 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 42328 00004334 1E                              push    ds              ;
 42329 00004335 06                              push    es              ;
 42330 00004336 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 42331 00004337 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 42332 0000433A 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 42333 0000433C 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 42334 0000433E 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 42335 0000433F 5E                              pop     si              ;
 42336 00004340 59                              pop     cx              ;
 42337 00004341 58                              pop     ax              ;
 42338                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 42339 00004342 C3                              retn			;
 42340                                  
 42341                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42342                                  ;
 42343                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 42344                                  ;
 42345                                  ;   INPUT
 42346                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 42347                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 42348                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 42349                                  ;
 42350                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42351                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 42352                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 42353                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42354                                  ;
 42355                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42356                                  ;       AX
 42357                                  ;
 42358                                  ;   NOTES
 42359                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 42360                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 42361                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 42362                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 42363                                  ;
 42364                                  ;   HISTORY
 42365                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42366                                  ;
 42367                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42368                                  
 42369                                  find_block:
 42370 00004343 E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 42371 00004346 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 42372 00004348 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 42373 0000434A 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 42374 0000434C 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 42375 0000434E 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 42376 00004350 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 42377 00004352 2E800E[6519]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 42378 00004358 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 42379                                  check_line:
 42380 0000435A 2E800E[6519]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 42381 00004360 E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 42382 00004363 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 42383                                  next_line:
 42384 00004365 E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 42385 00004368 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 42386                                  ;find_exit:
 42387                                  ;	retn
 42388                                  
 42389                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42390                                  ;
 42391                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 42392                                  ;
 42393                                  ;   INPUT
 42394                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 42395                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42396                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42397                                  ;
 42398                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42399                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 42400                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 42401                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42402                                  ;
 42403                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42404                                  ;       AX
 42405                                  ;
 42406                                  ;   NOTES
 42407                                  ;       None
 42408                                  ;
 42409                                  ;   HISTORY
 42410                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42411                                  ;
 42412                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42413                                  
 42414                                  comp_names:
 42415 0000436A 57                              push    di              ;
 42416                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 42417 0000436B E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 42418 0000436E 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 42419 00004370 E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 42420 00004373 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 42421 00004375 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 42422 00004377 47                              inc     di              ;
 42423 00004378 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 42424                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 42425 0000437B 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 42426 0000437D 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 42427 0000437F F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 42428                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 42429 00004380 5F                              pop     di              ;
 42430 00004381 C3                              retn			;
 42431                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 42432 00004382 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 42433 00004384 E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 42434 00004387 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 42435 00004389 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 42436                                  
 42437                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42438                                  
 42439                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 42440                                  comp_names_x:
 42441                                  	;
 42442                                  comp_names_safe:
 42443 0000438B 50                              push    ax
 42444 0000438C 51                              push    cx
 42445 0000438D 56                              push	si
 42446 0000438E 1E                              push    ds
 42447 0000438F 0E                              push    cs
 42448 00004390 1F                              pop     ds
 42449 00004391 E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 42450 00004394 1F                              pop     ds
 42451 00004395 5E                      	pop	si
 42452 00004396 59                              pop     cx
 42453 00004397 58                              pop     ax
 42454 00004398 C3                              retn

 42456                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42457                                  ;
 42458                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 42459                                  ;
 42460                                  ;   INPUT
 42461                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 42462                                  ;
 42463                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42464                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 42465                                  ;
 42466                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42467                                  ;       None
 42468                                  ;
 42469                                  ;   NOTES
 42470                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 42471                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 42472                                  ;
 42473                                  ;   HISTORY
 42474                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42475                                  ;
 42476                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42477                                  
 42478                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 42479                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 42480                                  
 42481                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 42482 00004399 50                              push    ax              ;
 42483 0000439A 53                              push    bx              ;
 42484 0000439B 51                              push    cx              ;
 42485 0000439C 52                              push    dx              ;
 42486 0000439D 56                              push    si              ;
 42487 0000439E B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 42488 000043A0 8A3E[7D4C]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 42489 000043A4 CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 42490 000043A6 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 42491 000043A7 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 42492 000043A9 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 42493 000043AB 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 42494 000043AE B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 42495 000043B0 CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 42496 000043B2 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 42497 000043B4 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 42498 000043B6 8A26[7C4C]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 42499 000043BA 3A1E[864C]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 42500 000043BE 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 42501 000043C0 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 42502 000043C3 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 42503 000043C5 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 42504 000043C7 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 42505 000043C9 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 42506 000043CB 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 42507 000043CD 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 42508                                  print_other:                    ;
 42509 000043D0 B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 42510 000043D2 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 42511 000043D4 8BBF[AA4C]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 42512 000043D8 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 42513 000043DA 8A3E[7D4C]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 42514 000043DE B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 42515 000043E0 B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 42516 000043E3 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42517 000043E5 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 42518 000043E7 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 42519 000043E9 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42520                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 42521 000043EB B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 42522 000043EE CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 42523 000043F0 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 42524 000043F2 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 42525 000043F4 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42526                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 42527 000043F6 B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 42528 000043F9 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 42529 000043FB FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 42530 000043FD B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 42531 000043FF CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42532 00004401 06                              push    es              ;
 42533                                  print_loop:                     ;
 42534 00004402 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 42535 00004405 47                              inc     di              ;
 42536 00004406 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 42537 00004408 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 42538 0000440A B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 42539                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 42540 0000440C 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 42541 0000440E 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 42542 00004410 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 42543 00004412 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 42544 00004414 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 42545 00004416 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42546 00004418 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 42547 0000441A 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 42548 0000441D 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 42549 0000441F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 42550 00004421 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42551 00004423 EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 42552                                  print_done:                     ;
 42553 00004425 07                              pop     es              ;
 42554 00004426 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 42555 00004427 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 42556 00004429 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 42557 0000442B 5E                              pop     si              ;
 42558 0000442C 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 42559 0000442D 59                              pop     cx              ;
 42560 0000442E 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 42561 0000442F 58                              pop     ax              ;
 42562 00004430 C3                              retn			;
 42563                                  
 42564                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42565                                  ;
 42566                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 42567                                  ;
 42568                                  ;   INPUT
 42569                                  ;       None
 42570                                  ;
 42571                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42572                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 42573                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 42574                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 42575                                  ;
 42576                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42577                                  ;       None
 42578                                  ;
 42579                                  ;   NOTES
 42580                                  ;       None
 42581                                  ;
 42582                                  ;   HISTORY
 42583                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42584                                  ;
 42585                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42586                                  
 42587                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 42588 00004431 8A1E[864C]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 42589 00004435 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 42590 00004437 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 42591 0000443A E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 42592 0000443D 803E[8A4C]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 42593 00004442 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 42594 00004444 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 42595 00004446 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 42596 00004448 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 42597                                  check_time:
 42598 0000444A A0[8A4C]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 42599 0000444D 2A06[8B4C]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 42600 00004451 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 42601 00004453 800E[854C]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 42602 00004458 C606[8B4C]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 42603 0000445D E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 42604                                  show_time:
 42605 00004460 53                              push    bx              ;
 42606 00004461 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 42607 00004463 8A3E[7D4C]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 42608 00004467 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 42609 00004469 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42610 0000446B 52                              push    dx              ;
 42611 0000446C 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 42612 0000446F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 42613 00004471 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42614 00004473 BA[2753]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 42615 00004476 E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 42616 00004479 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 42617 0000447B 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 42618 0000447C B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 42619 0000447E F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 42620 00004480 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 42621 00004482 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 42622 00004484 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 42623 00004486 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 42624 00004488 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 42625 0000448A 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 42626 0000448C B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 42627 0000448E CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 42628 00004490 5A                              pop     dx
 42629 00004491 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 42630 00004493 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42631 00004495 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 42632                                  input_key:
 42633 00004496 B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 42634 00004498 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 42635 0000449A CD21                            int     21h             ;
 42636 0000449C 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 42637 0000449E 803E[8A4C]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 42638 000044A3 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 42639 000044A5 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 42640 000044A7 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 42641 000044A9 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 42642 000044AB 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 42643 000044AD 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 42644 000044AF 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 42645 000044B1 B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 42646                                  got_time:
 42647 000044B3 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 42648 000044B5 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 42649 000044B7 0036[8B4C]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 42650 000044BB EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 42651                                  got_key:
 42652 000044BD 50                              push    ax              ;
 42653 000044BE B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 42654 000044C1 8706[8A4C]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 42655 000044C5 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 42656 000044C7 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 42657 000044C9 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 42658 000044CA B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 42659 000044CD 8B1E[7C4C]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 42660 000044D1 B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 42661 000044D4 CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 42662 000044D6 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 42663                                  
 42664                                  timeout_disabled:

 42669 000044DE 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 42670                                  
 42671 000044E0 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 42672 000044E2 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no

 42677 000044F0 FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item

 42679                                  not_up:

 42684 000044FE FE06[864C]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;

 42686 00004505 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 42687                                  print1:

 42694                                  not_down:
 42695 00004510 F606[814C]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 42696 00004515 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5

 42702                                  not_f8:
 42703 00004526 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 42704 00004528 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 42705                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 42706                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 42707                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)

 42856                                  ;
 42857                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 42858                                  ;
 42859                                  ;   INPUT
 42860                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42861                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42862                                  ;
 42863                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42864                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 42865                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 42866                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 42867                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42868                                  ;
 42869                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42870                                  ;       AX
 42871                                  ;
 42872                                  ;   NOTES
 42873                                  ;       None
 42874                                  ;
 42875                                  ;   HISTORY
 42876                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42877                                  ;
 42878                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42879                                  
 42880                                  skip_token:
 42881 000045BE E84D00                          call    get_char
 42882 000045C1 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 42883 000045C3 E8B401                          call    any_delim
 42884 000045C6 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 42885                                  skip_check_eol:
 42886 000045C8 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 42887 000045CA 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 42888 000045CC 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 42889 000045CE 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 42890 000045D0 F8                              clc
 42891                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 42892 000045D1 C3                      	retn
 42893                                  skip_token_eol:
 42894 000045D2 F9                              stc
 42895                                  skip_token_done:
 42896 000045D3 C3                              retn
 42897                                  
 42898                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42899                                  ;
 42900                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 42901                                  ;
 42902                                  ;   INPUT
 42903                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42904                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42905                                  ;
 42906                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42907                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 42908                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 42909                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 42910                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42911                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 42912                                  ;
 42913                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42914                                  ;       AX
 42915                                  ;
 42916                                  ;   NOTES
 42917                                  ;       None
 42918                                  ;
 42919                                  ;   HISTORY
 42920                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42921                                  ;
 42922                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42923                                  
 42924                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 42925 000045D4 E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 42926 000045D7 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 42927 000045DA 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 42928 000045DC E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 42929 000045DF 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 42930 000045E1 EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 42931                                  
 42932                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42933                                  ;
 42934                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 42935                                  ;
 42936                                  ;   INPUT
 42937                                  ;       AL == last character read
 42938                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42939                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42940                                  ;
 42941                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42942                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 42943                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 42944                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 42945                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42946                                  ;
 42947                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42948                                  ;       AX
 42949                                  ;
 42950                                  ;   NOTES
 42951                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 42952                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 42953                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 42954                                  ;
 42955                                  ;   HISTORY
 42956                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42957                                  ;
 42958                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42959                                  
 42960                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 42961                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 42962                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 42963                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 42964                                       
 42965                                  	; fall into skip_line
 42966                                  
 42967                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42968                                  ;
 42969                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 42970                                  ;
 42971                                  ;   INPUT
 42972                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42973                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42974                                  ;
 42975                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42976                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 42977                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 42978                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42979                                  ;
 42980                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42981                                  ;       AX
 42982                                  ;
 42983                                  ;   NOTES
 42984                                  ;       None
 42985                                  ;
 42986                                  ;   HISTORY
 42987                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42988                                  ;

 42990                                  
 42991                                  skip_line:
 42992 000045E3 E82800                          call    get_char
 42993 000045E6 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 42994                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 42995 000045E8 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah

 42997                                  skip_line_done:
 42998                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 42999 000045EC C3                              retn

 43002                                  ;
 43003                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 43004                                  ;
 43005                                  ;   INPUT

 43007                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys

 43009                                  ;   OUTPUT

 43011                                  ;       BX == binary #

 43028                                  get_number:
 43029 000045ED 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 43030                                  num_loop:
 43031 000045EF E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 43032 000045F2 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;

 43034 000045F6 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number

 43036 000045FA 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;

 43038 000045FD B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 43039 00004600 52                              push    dx              ;
 43040 00004601 F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 43041 00004603 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 43042 00004604 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 43043 00004606 58                              pop     ax              ;
 43044 00004607 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 43045 00004609 98                              cbw                     ;
 43046 0000460A 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 43047 0000460C EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;

 43054                                  ;
 43055                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 43056                                  ;
 43057                                  ;   INPUT
 43058                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 43059                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 43060                                  ;
 43061                                  ;   OUTPUT

 43063                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 43064                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 43065                                  ;

 43067                                  ;       AX

 43079 00004611 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 43080                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 43081 00004613 26                      	es	
 43082 00004614 AC                      	lodsb
 43083 00004615 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 43084 00004617 C3                              retn			;
 43085                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 43086 00004618 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 43087                                  nearby_ret:
