 43091                                  ;
 43092                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 43093                                  ;
 43094                                  ;   INPUT
 43095                                  ;       AL == current command code
 43096                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 43097                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 43098                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 43099                                  ;
 43100                                  ;   OUTPUT
 43101                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 43102                                  ;
 43103                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 43104                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 43105                                  ;
 43106                                  ;   NOTES
 43107                                  ;       None
 43108                                  ;
 43109                                  ;   HISTORY
 43110                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 43111                                  ;
 43112                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43113                                  
 43114                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 43115                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 43116                                  
 43117                                  	; 12/12/2022
 43118                                  query_user:
 43119 0000461C F606[854C]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 43120                                  	; 01/01/2023
 43121 00004621 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 43122 00004623 E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 43123                                  	; 12/12/2022
 43124                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 43125                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 43126                                  qu_1:
 43127 00004626 F606[854C]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 43128 0000462B 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 43129 0000462D 50                              push    ax                      ;
 43130 0000462E A0[6419]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 43131 00004631 F606[854C]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 43132 00004636 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 43133 00004638 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 43134                                  	; 01/01/2023
 43135 0000463A 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 43136                                  	; 12/12/2022
 43137                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 43138                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 43139                                  
 43140                                  	; 01/01/2023
 43141 0000463C 58                      	pop	ax
 43142 0000463D C3                      	retn
 43143                                  
 43144                                  query_all:
 43145                                  
 43146                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 43147                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 43148                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 43149                                  
 43150 0000463E 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 43151 0000463F BA[8253]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 43152 00004642 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 43153 00004644 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 43154                                  
 43155 00004646 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 43156 00004648 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 43157 0000464A BF[D24C]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 43158                                  find_match:                             ;
 43159 0000464D 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 43160 0000464F 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 43161 00004651 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 43162 00004653 47                              inc     di                      ;
 43163 00004654 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 43164 00004656 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 43165 00004658 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 43166                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 43167 0000465B EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 43168                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 43169 0000465D 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 43170 00004660 B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 43171 00004662 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 43172                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 43173 00004664 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 43174 00004666 47                              inc     di                      ;
 43175 00004667 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 43176 00004669 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 43177 0000466B E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 43178 0000466D B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 43179 0000466F 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 43180 00004672 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 43181 00004674 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 43182                                  cmd_notset:
 43183 00004676 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 43184                                  line_print:                             ;
 43185                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 43186 00004678 26                              es
 43187 00004679 AC                      	lodsb
 43188 0000467A 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 43189 0000467C 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 43190 0000467E B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 43191                                  non_null:                               ;

 43309                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43310                                  
 43311                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 43312                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 43313                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 43314                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 43315                                  
 43316                                  disable_autoexec:
 43317                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 43318                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 43319                                  
 43320 00004717 F606[854C]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 43321 0000471C 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 43322 0000471E F606[7B4C]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 43323 00004723 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 43324 00004725 800E[7B4C]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 43325                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 43326 0000472A 810E[854C]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 43327 00004730 BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 43328                                  dae_1:
 43329                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 43330 00004733 A0[BA4B]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 43331                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 43332 00004736 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 43333 00004738 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 43334 0000473A 8A1E[BB4B]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 43335 0000473E B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 43336 00004740 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 43337 00004742 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 43338 00004745 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 43339 00004748 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 43340 0000474A 881E[BB4B]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 43341 0000474E 81C3[BC4B]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 43342 00004752 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 43343                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 43344 00004753 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 43345 00004756 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;

 43493                                  ; 
 43494                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 43495                                  ;
 43496                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43497                                  
 43498                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 43499                                  
 43500                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 43501                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 43502                                  mapcase:
 43503 000047C6 51                      	push	cx
 43504 000047C7 56                      	push	si
 43505 000047C8 1E                      	push	ds
 43506                                  
 43507 000047C9 06                      	push	es
 43508 000047CA 1F                      	pop	ds
 43509                                  
 43510                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 43511                                  
 43512                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 43513                                  
 43514                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 43515 000047CB 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 43516                                  ;else
 43517                                  ;	xor	si,si
 43518                                  ;endif
 43519                                  	; 02/11/2022
 43520                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 43521                                  	;xor	si, si
 43522                                  
 43523                                  convloop:
 43524 000047CD AC                      	lodsb
 43525 000047CE 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 43526 000047D0 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 43527 000047D2 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 43528 000047D4 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 43529 000047D6 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 43530 000047D8 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 43531                                  noconv:
 43532                                  
 43533                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 43534                                  
 43535                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 43536                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 43537                                  
 43538                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 43539                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 43540                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 43541                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 43542                                  ;
 43543 000047DB 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 43544 000047DE 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 43545 000047E0 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 43546 000047E2 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 43547                                  check_eol:
 43548 000047E4 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 43549 000047E6 7406                    	je	short convdone
 43550 000047E8 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 43551 000047EA 7402                    	je	short convdone
 43552                                  ;endif
 43553                                  	; 02/11/2022
 43554 000047EC E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 43555                                  convdone:
 43556 000047EE 1F                      	pop	ds
 43557 000047EF 5E                      	pop	si
 43558 000047F0 59                      	pop	cx
 43559 000047F1 C3                      	retn

 43681                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43682                                  ;
 43683                                  ; procedure : getnum
 43684                                  ;
 43685                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 43686                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 43687                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 43688                                  ;
 43689                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43690                                  
 43691                                  getnum:
 43692 00004865 53                      	push	bx
 43693 00004866 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 43694                                  b2:
 43695 00004868 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 43696 0000486B 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 43697                                  
 43698 0000486D 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 43699 0000486E 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 43700                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 43701                                  	; 12/12/2022
 43702 0000486F B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 43703 00004871 F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 43704 00004873 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 43705 00004874 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 43706 00004876 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 43707 00004879 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 43708                                  
 43709 0000487B 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 43710                                  
 43711 0000487C E830FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 43712 0000487F 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 43713 00004881 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 43714 00004883 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 43715 00004885 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 43716 00004887 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 43717 00004889 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 43718 0000488B 7417                    	je	short b15
 43719 0000488D 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 43720 00004892 7410                    	je	short b15
 43721 00004894 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 43722                                  	; 12/12/2022
 43723                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 43724                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 43725                                  	;nop
 43726 00004896 740C                    	je	short b15
 43727 00004898 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 43728 0000489A 7408                    	je	short b15
 43729 0000489C 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 43730 0000489E 7404                    	je	short b15
 43731 000048A0 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 43732 000048A2 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 43733                                  b15:
 43734 000048A4 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 43735 000048A9 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 43736                                  b1:
 43737 000048AE 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 43738 000048B0 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 43739 000048B2 5B                      	pop	bx
 43740 000048B3 C3                      	retn
 43741                                  badnum:
 43742                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 43743                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 43744 000048B4 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 43745                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 43746 000048B6 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 43747 000048BA 5B                      	pop	bx
 43748 000048BB F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 43749 000048BC C3                      	retn

 43753                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 43754                                  
 43755                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43756                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 43757                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 43758                                  ;	si = 0
 43759                                  ;	ax = country id
 43760                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 43761                                  ;	bx = file handle
 43762                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 43763                                  ;
 43764                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 43765                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 43766                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 43767                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 43768                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43769                                  
 43770                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 43771                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 43772                                  
 43773                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 43774                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)	
 43775                                  
 43776 000048BD 57                      	push	di
 43777 000048BE 50                      	push	ax
 43778 000048BF 52                      	push	dx
 43779                                  
 43780 000048C0 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 43781 000048C2 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx

 43783 000048C7 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 43784 000048CA 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 43785

 43787 000048CD 56                      	push	si
 43788

 43801 000048DF 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 43802 000048E2 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 43803

 43805 000048E5 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 43806 000048E7 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]

 43819 000048FE 5F                      	pop	di
 43820                                  
 43821                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.

 43918 0000498E 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.

 44016                                  getcountrydestination:
 44017                                  
 44018                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44019                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 44020                                  ;
 44021                                  ;input: al - data id
 44022                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 44023                                  ;on return:
 44024                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 44025                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 44026                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44027                                  
 44028                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 44029                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 44030                                  
 44031                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 44032                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 44033                                  
 44034 000049E2 51                      	push	cx
 44035                                  	;add	di,74
 44036 000049E3 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 44037                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 44038 000049E6 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 44039 000049E9 47                      	inc	di
 44040 000049EA 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 44041                                  
 44042                                  getcntrydest:
 44043 000049EB 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 44044 000049EE 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 44045                                  
 44046 000049F0 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 44047 000049F4 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 44048                                  
 44049 000049F6 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 44050 000049F9 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 44051                                  
 44052                                  getcntrydest_1:
 44053                                  	;add	di,41
 44054 000049FB 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 44055                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 44056 000049FE E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 44057 00004A00 F9                      	stc
 44058                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 44059                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 44060                                  	; 10/09/2023
 44061 00004A01 59                      	pop	cx
 44062 00004A02 C3                      	retn
 44063                                  
 44064                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 44065                                  	; 10/09/2023
 44066 00004A03 47                      	inc	di
 44067                                  
 44068                                  ;	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 44069                                  ;	jne	short getcntrydest_ok1
 44070                                  ;
 44071                                  ;	;inc	di			;now di -> cccountryinfolen
 44072                                  ;	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 44073                                  
 44074                                  	; 10/09/2023
 44075 00004A04 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 44076 00004A06 74F9                    	je	short getcntrydest_exit
 44077                                  
 44078                                  getcntrydest_ok1:
 44079                                  	;les	di,[es:di+1]		;get the destination in es:di
 44080                                  	; 10/09/2023
 44081 00004A08 26C43D                  	les	di,[es:di]
 44082                                  ;getcntrydest_exit:
 44083 00004A0B 59                      	pop	cx
 44084 00004A0C C3                      	retn
 44085                                  
 44086                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44087                                  
 44088                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 44089                                  
 44090                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44091                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 44092                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 44093                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 44094                                  ;
 44095                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 44096                                  ;	 be moved.
 44097                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 44098                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 44099                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 44100                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 44101                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 44102                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 44103                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44104                                  
 44105 00004A0D 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 44106 00004A0E B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 44107 00004A11 F9                      	stc
 44108 00004A12 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 44109 00004A14 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 44110 00004A15 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 44111                                  
 44112 00004A17 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 44113 00004A19 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 44114 00004A1B B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 44115 00004A1D F9                      	stc
 44116 00004A1E CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 44117                                  ricb_exit:
 44118 00004A20 C3                      	retn
 44119                                  
 44120                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44121                                  
 44122                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 44123                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 44124                                  %if 0
 44125                                  
 44126                                  set_country_path:
 44127                                  
 44128                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44129                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 44130                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 44131                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 44132                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 44133                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 44134                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 44135                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44136                                  
 44137                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 44138                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 44139                                  
 44140                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 44141                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 44142                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 44143                                  
 44144                                  	push	si
 44145                                  
 44146                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 44147                                  	push	es
 44148                                  	pop	ds
 44149                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 44150                                  
 44151                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 44152                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 44153                                  
 44154                                  	mov	al,[si]
 44155                                  	inc	si
 44156                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 44157                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 44158                                  
 44159                                  scp_default_drv:
 44160                                  	mov	ah,19h
 44161                                  	int	21h
 44162                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 44163                                  
 44164                                  scp_setdrv:
 44165                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 44166                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 44167                                  	mov	al,[si]
 44168                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 44169                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 44170                                  
 44171                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 44172                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 44173                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 44174                                  	; 04/01/2023
 44175                                  	jne	short scp_path
 44176                                  
 44177                                  scp_root_dir:
 44178                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 44179                                  scp_path:
 44180                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 44181                                  
 44182                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 44183                                  scpath_exit:
 44184                                  
 44185                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 44186                                  	push	es
 44187                                  	pop	ds
 44188                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 44189                                  
 44190                                  	pop	si
 44191                                  	retn
 44192                                  
 44193                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44194                                  
 44195                                  chk_drive_letter:
 44196                                  
 44197                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 44198                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 44199                                  ;carry set if not.
 44200                                  
 44201                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 44202                                  
 44203                                  	push	ax
 44204                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 44205                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 44206                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 44207                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 44208                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 44209                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 44210                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 44211                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 44212                                  	; 04/01/2023
 44213                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 44214                                  
 44215                                  cdletter_no:
 44216                                  	stc
 44217                                  cdletter_exit:
 44218                                  	pop	ax
 44219                                  	retn
 44220                                  
 44221                                  %endif
 44222                                  
 44223                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44224                                  
 44225                                  move_asciiz:
 44226                                  
 44227                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target
 44228                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 44229                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 44230                                  
 44231                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 44232                                  	; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4F40h)
 44233                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:5187h)
 44234                                  
 44235                                  masciiz_loop:
 44236                                  	; 10/09/2023
 44237 00004A21 F604FF                  	test	byte [si],0FFh
 44238 00004A24 A4                      	movsb
 44239                                  	;cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?
 44240                                  	;jne	short masciiz_loop
 44241 00004A25 75FA                    	jnz	short masciiz_loop ; 10/09/2023
 44242 00004A27 C3                      	retn
 44243                                  
 44244                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44245                                  
 44246                                  ;	ds:dx points to string to output (asciz)
 44247                                  ;
 44248                                  ;	prints <badld_pre> <string> <badld_post>
 44249                                  
 44250                                  badfil:
 44251 00004A28 0E                      	push	cs
 44252 00004A29 07                      	pop	es
 44253                                  
 44254 00004A2A 89D6                    	mov	si,dx
 44255                                  badload:
 44256 00004A2C BA[B350]                	mov	dx,badld_pre	; want to print config error
 44257 00004A2F BB[7050]                	mov	bx,crlfm
 44258                                  prnerr:
 44259 00004A32 0E                      	push	cs
 44260 00004A33 1F                      	pop	ds ; *
 44261 00004A34 E81D00                  	call	print
 44262                                  prn1:
 44263 00004A37 268A14                  	mov	dl,[es:si]
 44264 00004A3A 08D2                    	or	dl,dl
 44265 00004A3C 7407                    	jz	short prn2
 44266 00004A3E B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2 
 44267 00004A40 CD21                    	int	21h
 44268 00004A42 46                      	inc	si
 44269 00004A43 EBF2                    	jmp	short prn1
 44270                                  prn2:
 44271 00004A45 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx
 44272 00004A47 E80A00                  	call	print
 44273                                  	; 11/12/2022
 44274                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 44275 00004A4A 803E[5503]01            	cmp	byte [donotshownum],1
 44276                                  				; suppress line number when handling command.com
 44277                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:donotshownum],1

 44279

 44281                                  	;call	error_line

 44284                                  	;retn

 44980                                  number3mod	equ (number3div % 16)
 44981                                  
 44982                                  %if (number3mod>0) & (number3mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 44983 00005408 00<rep 8h>              		times (16-number3mod) db 0
 44984                                  %endif
